title: URADNO: Povratek v Evropo odpade, Portugalec bo najboljsฬa leta pustil v Savdski Arabiji
content: Ruben Neves (foto: uradna spletna stran kluba) Joao Neves je bil tudi letos na radarju sฬtevilnih evropskih velikanov, na koncu pa se je odlocฬil, da bo podaljsฬal epizodo v prvenstvu Saudi Pro League. Portugalski zvezdnik Ruben Neves je leta 2023 nekoliko presenetil, ko se je zฬe zgodaj v karieri odlocฬil za prestop v Savdsko Arabijo. Takrat je Al Hilal zanj Wolverhamptonu placฬal kar 55 milijonov evrov, Neves pa je bil tarcฬa tudi pri vecฬjih evropskih prvoligasฬih. Letos se je 28-letnik znasฬel v povezavah s povratkom na staro celino, toda ne bo se zgodilo. Danes je namrecฬ Ruben Neves podaljsฬal pogodbo pri Al Hilalu in odslej bo na klub iz Saudi Pro League vezan vsaj sฬe do poletja leta 2029. Reprezentant Portugalske, ki je bil tudi na radarju Manchester Uniteda in Real Madrida, je za Al Hilal zbral zฬe 115 nastopov v vseh tekmovanjih. Doslej je po enkrat osvojil prvenstvo ter pokal in tudi letos se s soigralci bori za nov naslov drzฬavnih prvakov Savdske Arabije. Letos poleti bo Joao Neves s Portugalsko igral na svetovnem prvenstvu v ZDA, Kanadi in Mehiki, v skupini K bodo igrali z Uzbekistanom, Kolumbijo in eno od reprezentanc, ki si bo morala svoje mesto na mundialu sฬe izboriti v dodatnih kvalifikacijah. Portugalci svetovni prvaki sฬe niso bili, enkrat so osvojili Euro in dvakrat UEFA ligo narodov. Al Hilal se trenutno nahaja na prvem mestu v Saudi Pro League, ima tocฬko vecฬ od Al Nassra (Cristiano Ronaldo) in tri vecฬ od Al Ahlija. Ruben Neves is Hilali until 2029 ๐คฉ๐ pic.twitter.com/f1CMpSFa3L โ AlHilal Saudi Club (@Alhilal_EN) February 4, 2026

content: TFF 3. Lig 4. Grup'ta 3 macฬงlฤฑk galibiyet hasretine gecฬงen hafta Alanya 1221 FK'yฤฑ yenerek son verip grup ikinciligฬi yarฤฑsฬงฤฑnฤฑ bฤฑrakmayan Karsฬงฤฑyaka ara transferin son guฬnlerinde yine transfer yasagฬฤฑyla sarsฤฑldฤฑ. IฬLK YASAK 960 BIฬN LIฬRAYA KALKMISฬงTI, KOฬTUฬ HABER YIฬNE GELDIฬ Gecฬงen ay eski futbolculardan Cenk Ahmet Alkฤฑlฤฑcฬง'ฤฑn 960 bin TL civarฤฑndaki kesinlesฬงmisฬง alacagฬฤฑnฤฑ oฬdeyip transfer yasagฬฤฑnฤฑ kaldฤฑran Kaf-Kaf'a yine yasak geldi. Takฤฑmda gecฬงen sezonlarda forma giyen Iฬshak Kurt, Hasan Suฬrmeli gibi bazฤฑ oyuncularฤฑn alacak dosyalarฤฑnฤฑn Futbol Federasyonu'nda kesinlesฬงtigฬi oฬgฬrenildi. Karsฬงฤฑyaka, yaklasฬงฤฑk 3.5 milyon TL civarฤฑnda olan bu parayฤฑ oฬdeyip transfer yasagฬฤฑnฤฑ kaldฤฑrmadan yeni alacagฬฤฑ futbolculara profesyonel lisans cฬงฤฑkaramayacak. IฬLYAS'A AMATOฬR FORMUฬLUฬ Ara transfer doฬneminde daha oฬnce 3'uฬ amatoฬr ligden toplam 5 takviye yaparak profesyonel soฬzlesฬงme imzalayan Karsฬงฤฑyaka, listesindeki Mazฤฑdagฬฤฑ Fosfatspor'dan 29 yasฬงฤฑndaki stoper Iฬlyas Ural'la anlasฬงmaya vardฤฑ. Bahis sorusฬงturmasฤฑnda kasฤฑm ayฤฑnda 12 ay hak mahrumiyeti cezasฤฑ alan Erol'un yoklugฬuyla defansta olusฬงan bosฬงlugฬu Iฬlyas'la doldurmaya cฬงalฤฑsฬงan Karsฬงฤฑyaka son dakika transfer yasagฬฤฑyla karsฬงฤฑlasฬงtฤฑ. Yoฬnetim, profesyonel futbolcu olan Iฬlyas'ฤฑ transferde bu sezon degฬisฬงen statuฬde amatoฬre doฬnduฬrerek kadroya katmaya cฬงalฤฑsฬงฤฑyor. Eskisฬงehirspor, Afyonspor, Nazillispor gibi TFF'de transfer yasagฬฤฑ bulunan bircฬงok kuluฬp bu sezon transferde aynฤฑ yolu uyguladฤฑ.

content: Mundvandet lรธber nรฆsten, naฬr tankerne falder paฬ det overdaฬdige nytaฬrsmaฬltid, vi snart skal mรฆske os i. Den delikate bรธf, fine fisk, kransekage og bobler. Det ekstravagante vรฆlges til, selvom det krรฆver, at der skal graves dybere i pengepungen. Og baฬde slagtere, fiskehandlere og specialbutikker oplever da ogsaฬ i disse dage danskernes kรธbelyst. Et af de steder er Schou's i Marielyst. Og som ejer Sรธren Schou fortรฆller, er der โfuld hammer paฬ salgetโ i slagterbutikken. - Hvis man paฬ en pรฆn jysk maฬde skal sige det, saฬ kan vi ikke klage, fortรฆller han. Det populรฆre kรธd Danskerne skal have de รฆdlere og dyrere stykker kรธd: oksefilet og mรธrbrad, en bov til grydesteg, hรธjreb med ben og en del wagyukรธd, hvilket er en sรฆrlig type oksekรธd fra japanske kvรฆg. Over aฬrene har slagteren oplevet, at kundernes prรฆferencer har รฆndret sig. Fรธrhen var det mere eller mindre kun oksemรธrbrad, kunderne ville have. Nu kigger de ogsaฬ andre steder hen i slagterdisken. Mad ud af huset Schou's sรฆlger ogsaฬ nytaฬrsmenuer ud af huset, hvilket medarbejderne har haft sindssygt travlt med i aฬr. 1100-1200 kuverter kunne det blive til. Menuer, der for lรฆngst er udsolgt. Og i aฬr har juletidskalenderen vรฆret upaฬklagelig, fortรฆller slagteren. - Dagene er faldet perfekt for saฬdan en butik som vores, da den 27. og 28. december laฬ paฬ en lรธrdag og sรธndag, siger han, og fortรฆller, at han ligesom andre ogsaฬ oplever, at flere og flere bestiller nytaฬrsmenuen i stedet for at lave den selv. Selvom salget har vรฆret blรฆndende, gaฬr kunderne ikke forgรฆves, hvis nogen stadig mangler nytaฬrskรธdet. - Selvfรธlgelig kan der vรฆre dele, som vi ikke kan klare mere, men alle kan faฬ et godt stykke kรธd til nytaฬr, siger Sรธren Schou. De nye valg Men maฬske er du mere fisketypen. Til forret, hovedret eller som รธstersappetizer til boblerne. Et af de steder, hvor du kan faฬ fingre i det under overfladen, er Annes Fisk i Nykรธbing. Der er 30. december da ogsaฬ her godt gang i salget, og kรธen strรฆkker sig et stykke ned ad Sjรฆllandsgade. Nytaฬrstorsken har for mange maฬtte lade livet. Andre fisk har overtaget dens plads, men enkelte holder dog stadig fast paฬ trods af den hรธje pris, fortรฆller ejeren Martin Stanley Quaife. Kammuslinger og pighvar er efterspรธrgslen stor paฬ.Samtidig har รธstersen ifรธlge ejeren faฬet sig noget af et comeback. Hummeren er omvendt i tilbagegang, hvilket ikke betyder det store for fiskehandleren, da kunderne i stedet har fundet andre gode alternativer. - King Crab er de begyndt at...

title: Portrait : Atisha Dajee : Elle a mijoteฬ le succeฬs de Manzeฬ Lacaz aฬ feu doux
content: Atisha Dajee, 25 ans, habite aฬ Seฬbastopol. Jeune entrepreneure, elle geฬre deux entreprises : une speฬcialiseฬe dans les frames et une autre dans la vente de masala. Elle fait eฬgalement du travail administratif et creฬe du contenu pour des marques sous contrat. Mais sa plus grande passion reste la cuisine. Tout commence aฬ lโaฬge de 13 ans. Sa meฬre travaillait loin et rentrait tard aฬ la maison, tandis que sa grand-meฬre venait parfois cuisiner. Un jour, Atisha deฬcide de preฬparer elle-meฬme le repas familial : riz, lentilles noires, breฬdes aฬ lโeฬtouffeฬe et petites pommes de terre frites โ un plat quโelle adore encore aujourdโhui. Avec le temps, elle apprend aฬ mieux cuisiner, aฬ doser les ingreฬdients et aฬ organiser les repas. Apreฬs lโeฬcole, preฬparer aฬ manger devient une habitude et surtout un plaisir. Pendant le Covid-19, elle profite pour apprendre aฬ faire des gaฬteaux et des desserts. Ensuite, avec un travail aux horaires chargeฬs, elle met la cuisine en pause pendant quelque temps. En 2022, elle commence aฬ poster des videฬos sur TikTok. Au deฬbut, ce sont des videฬos simples, puis elle se lance dans les food reviews avant de partager un concept plus personnel : Manzeฬ Lacaz, ouฬ elle montre la preฬparation de plats typiquement mauriciens. Aujourdโhui, son compte TikTok compte plus de 107 000 abonneฬs. La majoriteฬ de ses videฬos mettent en avant des plats traditionnels mauriciens quโelle preฬpare avec passion. Son contenu seฬduit un large public et lui a permis de se faire connaiฬtre. Ce succeฬs lui ouvre plusieurs portes : collaborations avec des marques, live cooking shows et une belle visibiliteฬ pour son business de masala, qui marche treฬs bien. Son activiteฬ de frames recฬงoit aussi de nombreuses commandes. En dehors de la cuisine, Atisha aime partager des videฬos en sari, car elle appreฬcie la mode et souhaite attirer lโattention sur diffeฬrents styles. Aujourdโhui, elle se sent eฬpanouie. Manzeฬ Lacaz est devenu bien plus quโun concept, mais un univers ouฬ elle peut cuisiner, raconter son histoire et exprimer sa creฬativiteฬ. Partout ouฬ elle va, beaucoup de personnes la reconnaissent graฬce aฬ ce nom. Creฬer du contenu lโa aussi aideฬe aฬ deฬcouvrir une nouvelle version dโelle-meฬme. Autrefois timide et reฬserveฬe, elle avait peur des critiques. Mais cette expeฬrience lui a appris aฬ rester forte et aฬ croire en elle-meฬme. Son message aux jeunes, garcฬงons comme filles : apprendre aฬ cuisiner nโest pas une honte. Essayez,...

content: Deprem uzmanฤฑ Prof. Dr. Haluk Eyidogฬan, Marmara Denizi'nde meydana gelmesi beklenen buฬyuฬk depremin yalnฤฑzca Iฬstanbul'u etkilemekle kalmayacagฬฤฑnฤฑ soฬyleyip, oฬnemli uyarฤฑlarda bulundu. Eyidogฬan, Marmara'ya kฤฑyฤฑsฤฑ bulunan illerin etkileyecegฬini belirterek, bu nedenle suฬrecin "Iฬstanbul depremi" degฬil, "Marmara depremi" olarak ele alฤฑnmasฤฑ gerektigฬini soฬyledi. Tekirdagฬ Buฬyuฬksฬงehir Belediyesince Yฤฑlmaz Iฬcฬงoฬz Sahnesiโnde duฬzenlenen "Afetlere Dayanฤฑklฤฑ Tekirdagฬ Cฬงalฤฑsฬงtayฤฑ" kapsamฤฑnda AA muhabirine degฬerlendirmelerde bulunan Eyidogฬan, kamuoyunda sฤฑkcฬงa kullanฤฑlan "Iฬstanbul depremi" ifadesinin gercฬงegฬi tam olarak yansฤฑtmadฤฑgฬฤฑnฤฑ ifade etti. "DEPREM TUฬRKIฬYE GENELIฬNIฬ ETKIฬLER" Beklenen depremin Iฬstanbul'un icฬงinde degฬil, Marmara Denizi'nde meydana gelecegฬine dikkati cฬงeken Eyidogฬan, "Iฬstanbul depremi' deniyor ya deprem, Iฬstanbul'un icฬงinde degฬil Marmara Denizi'nin icฬงinde olacak. 7 ve uฬzeri bir depremin Marmara Denizi'nde gercฬงeklesฬงmesi halinde, Iฬstanbul basฬงta olmak uฬzere Marmara'ya kฤฑyฤฑsฤฑ olan 7 ila 10 il etkilenir. Bu nedenle bu deprem bir Iฬstanbul depremi degฬil, Marmara depremidir." dedi.Eyidogฬan, Marmara'da meydana gelecek 7 ve uฬzeri buฬyuฬkluฬkte bir depremin yalnฤฑzca boฬlgeyi degฬil, Tuฬrkiye genelini sosyal ve ekonomik acฬงฤฑdan da olumsuz etkileyecegฬini vurguladฤฑ. "YIKIM SADECE FAYLA ACฬงIKLANAMAZ" Sฬงehirlerin depremden etkilenmesinde fay hattฤฑnฤฑn degฬil, depremin buฬyuฬkluฬgฬuฬnuฬn belirleyici oldugฬuna isฬงaret eden Eyidogฬan, sฬงoฬyle konusฬงtu:"Iฬcฬงinden fay gecฬงen il var ama yฤฑkฤฑlmฤฑyor, faydan uzakta olup yฤฑkฤฑlan il var. Kahramanmarasฬง merkezli depremlerde bunu acฬงฤฑkcฬงa goฬrduฬk. Yani olayฤฑ yalnฤฑz faya bagฬlamak da gerekmiyor. Egฬer olayฤฑ yalnฤฑz faya bagฬlasaydฤฑk, 17 Agฬustos 1999 depreminde Goฬlcuฬk merkezli depremde Avcฤฑlar yฤฑkฤฑlmazdฤฑ. Dolayฤฑsฤฑyla buฬyuฬk depremler boฬlge depremleridir ve hata varsa yapฤฑlarda, zeminde veya binalarda onu bulur ve yฤฑkar. Yani boฬyle bir gercฬงek var. Yฤฑkฤฑm yalnฤฑzca fayla acฬงฤฑklanamaz. Yapฤฑdaki ve zemindeki hata buฬyuฬk depremlerde mutlaka ortaya cฬงฤฑkar." "KURTULUSฬง UฬMIฬDIฬ YOK" Eyidogฬan, zemin etuฬduฬ, dogฬru yer secฬงimi ve etkin denetimin hayati oฬneme sahip oldugฬunu kaydetti.Yanlฤฑsฬง planlama, sฤฑvฤฑlasฬงma ve heyelan alanlarฤฑna yerlesฬงmenin buฬyuฬk risk olusฬงturdugฬunu vurgulayan Eyidogฬan, "Binalar icฬงin olumsuz yerlere yerlesฬงmek birinci hata. title: Youssef En-Nesyri Fenerbahcฬงe'ye veda etti
content: 2024-2025 sezonunun basฬงฤฑnda Sevilla'dan Fenerbahcฬงe 'ye transfer olan Youssef En-Nesyri, sarฤฑ-lacivertlilerden ayrฤฑldฤฑ. FENERBAHCฬงE'YE VEDA ETTIฬ Suฬper Lig'de zirve yarฤฑsฬงฤฑnฤฑ suฬrduฬren Fenerbahcฬงe'den 15 milyon Euro bonservis bedeli karsฬงฤฑlฤฑgฬฤฑnda Suudi Arabistan ekibi Al-Ittihad'a transfer olan En-Nesyri, veda mesajฤฑ paylasฬงtฤฑ. ''BASฬงIM DIฬK AYRILIYORUM'' ''Basฬงฤฑm dik ayrฤฑlฤฑyorum'' diyen En-Nesyri mesajฤฑnda, "Sevgili Fenerbahcฬงe ailesi, kariyerimde yeni bir yolculugฬa cฬงฤฑkma zamanฤฑ geldi ancak sizlere icฬงtenlikle tesฬงekkuฬr etmeden ayrฤฑlmam muฬmkuฬn degฬil. Bu formayฤฑ giymek ve Sฬงuฬkruฬ Saracogฬlu'nun cosฬงkusunu hissetmek, her zaman kalbimde tasฬงฤฑyacagฬฤฑm bir onurdur. Takฤฑm arkadasฬงlarฤฑma, teknik ekibe ve oฬzellikle siz taraftarlara ilk guฬnden beri verdigฬiniz kosฬงulsuz destek icฬงin tesฬงekkuฬr etmek istiyorum. Bu renkler icฬงin her sฬงeyimi verdigฬimi bilerek basฬงฤฑm dik ayrฤฑlฤฑyorum.'' ifadelerini kullandฤฑ. FENERBAHCฬงE RAKAMLARI Fenerbahcฬงe formasฤฑyla 1.5 sezon gecฬงiren 28 yasฬงฤฑndaki forvet, 79 macฬงta 38 gol ve 6 asistlik performans sergiledi.

title: Epstein bagฬlantฤฑsฤฑ Prens Andrew'i sarayฤฑndan etti, cฬงiftlik evine tasฬงฤฑndฤฑ
content: Jeffrey Epstein dosyalarฤฑnda adฤฑ gecฬงen ve pedofili iddialarฤฑyla sarsฤฑlan Iฬngiltere Kralฤฑ III. Charles'ฤฑn kardesฬงi Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, uzun suฬredir yasฬงadฤฑgฬฤฑ Windsor Kalesi'ndeki Royal Lodge malikanesinden ayrฤฑldฤฑ. Unvanlarฤฑnฤฑ kaybeden Andrew'un yeni adresi ise gecฬงici olarak Sandringham Sarayฤฑ'ndaki cฬงiftlik evi oldu. RESMIฬ MUฬLKTEN CฬงIฬFTLIฬK EVIฬNE Andrew'un 2003'ten bu yana kullandฤฑgฬฤฑ 75 yฤฑllฤฑk kira soฬzlesฬงmeli malikanesini bosฬงalttฤฑgฬฤฑ dogฬrulandฤฑ. Mountbatten-Windsor'ฤฑn Sandringham Sarayฤฑ arazisindeki Marsh Farm adlฤฑ cฬงiftlik evine yerlesฬงmesi planlanฤฑyor. Bu tasฬงฤฑnmanฤฑn tuฬm masraflarฤฑ, muฬlkuฬn sahibi olan Kral Charles tarafฤฑndan sฬงahsen karsฬงฤฑlanacak. UNVANLARI DA BIฬRER BIฬRER GIฬTTIฬ Virginia Giuffre'nin cinsel saldฤฑrฤฑ iddialarฤฑ sonrasฤฑ "York Duฬkuฬ" unvanฤฑndan feragat eden Andrew, gecฬงen yฤฑlฤฑn sonunda Kral Charles tarafฤฑndan resmen "Prens" unvanฤฑndan da men edilmisฬงti. ABD Adalet Bakanlฤฑgฬฤฑ'nฤฑn yayฤฑnladฤฑgฬฤฑ son belgeler, Andrew uฬzerindeki kamuoyu ve parlamento baskฤฑsฤฑnฤฑ zirveye tasฬงฤฑdฤฑ. DUฬSฬงUฬK KIฬRA TEPKIฬSIฬ Andrew'un Royal Lodge malikanesini cฬงok duฬsฬงuฬk bir bedelle kiralamasฤฑ Iฬngiliz Parlamentosu'nu da ayagฬa kaldฤฑrdฤฑ. Basฬงbakan Keir Starmer, Kraliyet muฬlklerinin denetlenmesi cฬงagฬrฤฑlarฤฑna destek vererek suฬrecin takipcฬงisi olacaklarฤฑnฤฑ belirtti. SARAH FERGUSON VE VAKIF SKANDALI Andrew'un eski esฬงi Sarah Ferguson'ฤฑn da Epstein ile olan yakฤฑnlฤฑgฬฤฑ, skandalฤฑn boyutunu buฬyuฬttuฬ. Ferguson'ฤฑn fahri basฬงkanlฤฑgฬฤฑnฤฑ yaptฤฑgฬฤฑ vakฤฑflar kendisiyle ilisฬงkisini keserken, kฤฑzlarฤฑnฤฑ Epstein'in adasฤฑna goฬtuฬrduฬgฬuฬ iddia edilen Sarah Vakfฤฑ kapatฤฑlma kararฤฑ aldฤฑ.

content: Renan Calheiros ( MDB-AL ), presidente da CAE (Comissaฬo de Assuntos Econoฬmicos) do Senado, apresentou o plano do trabalho iniciado hoje por um grupo de membros do colegiado que vai acompanhar as investigacฬงoฬes sobre a derrocada do Banco Master. Calheiros disse que a comissaฬo enviaraฬ questionamentos ateฬ ao presidente Luiz Inaฬcio Lula da Silva (PT) e se reuniraฬ com o presidente do Banco Central, Gabriel Galiฬpolo. O que aconteceu Um grupo de 12 senadores da CAE vai acompanhar as investigacฬงoฬes sobre o caso do Banco Master realizadas pela Poliฬcia Federal, pelo BC e outras autoridades. De acordo com Calheiros, o colegiado deve realizar sessoฬes de depoimentos e solicitar acesso a documentos da investigacฬงaฬo, inclusive materiais sob sigilo. Eฬ dever desta comissaฬo vasculhar o paฬntano do Banco Master e suas ramificacฬงoฬes, doa a quem doer. Tudo o que se faz no sistema financeiro deixa digitais. Trata-se de um tabuleiro que negociava CDBs com remuneracฬงaฬo irreal, muito acima do mercado e que, obviamente, mergulhou em um grave problema de liquidez. Para driblar uma insolveฬncia certa, jaฬ esperada pelo mercado, esses trapaceiros -- e pecฬงo desculpas, mas naฬo haฬ outro nome mais adequado -- tentaram vender um banco quebrado, sem ativos ou com ativos podres, a uma instituicฬงaฬo puฬblica. O trambique teve seu desfecho com a liquidacฬงaฬo do Banco Master, em novembro do ano passado. No meu modo de ver, e tambeฬm na avaliacฬงaฬo de muitas pessoas que conhecem o assunto, tratou-se de uma liquidacฬงaฬo tardia. Senador Renan Calheiros (MDB-AL), presidente da CAE Um dos objetivos do colegiado seraฬ propor mudancฬงas na legislacฬงaฬo para ampliar o poder do BC, segundo o presidente da CAE. O senador afirmou que, ao final dos trabalhos da comissaฬo, a CAE deve votar alteracฬงoฬes legais para permitir que a autoridade monetaฬria facฬงa uma fiscalizacฬงaฬo mais direta sobre fundos e aplicacฬงoฬes financeiras. Haveraฬ tambeฬm uma anaฬlise do envolvimento da classe poliฬtica na crise do Master. Calheiros criticou o fato de o dono do Master, Daniel Vorcaro, ter sido recebido por Lula. Segundo "O Globo", o banqueiro esteve no Planalto entre 2023 e 2024. A Presideฬncia da Repuฬblica nega que o banqueiro esteve com o petista. Estavam na Presideฬncia o ministro da Fazenda, Fernando Haddad; o [entaฬo] presidente do Banco Central, Roberto Campos Neto; o chefe da Casa Civil, Rui Costa; o liฬder do governo no Senado Federal, Jaques Wagner; e o ex-ministro Guido Mantega. content: Petrolul Ploiesฬฆti a obtฬฆinut o victorie extrem de importantaฬ martฬฆi seara, pe stadionul "Ilie Oanaฬ", impunaฬndu-se cu 1-0 iฬn fatฬฆa formatฬฆiei Unirea Slobozia, iฬntr-un duel din etapa a 25-a a Superliga Romaฬniei decis iฬn ultimele secunde. Meciul a fost controlat iฬn mare parte de echipa ploiesฬฆteanaฬ, care a pus presiune constantaฬ, dar a iฬntaฬmpinat mari dificultaฬtฬฆi la finalizare. Prima ocazie importantaฬ a venit chiar iฬn minutul 2, caฬnd Gheorghe Grozav a fost aproape de deschiderea scorului, iฬnsaฬ interventฬฆia portarului Denis Rusu a mentฬฆinut egalitatea. Dominarea gazdelor s-a accentuat, iar iฬn minutul 14 Petrolul Ploiesฬฆti a irosit o fazaฬ incredibilaฬ, cu sฬฆuturi consecutive ratate de Ricardinho, Raresฬฆ Pop sฬฆi Paul Papp. Valentin Gheorghe a fost sฬฆi el aproape de gol, iฬn minutul 21, caฬnd a scaฬpat singur spre poartaฬ, dar goalkeeperul ialomitฬฆenilor a reusฬฆit saฬ respingaฬ in extremis. Dupaฬ pauzaฬ, Paul Papp a lovit bara transversalaฬ, iฬn timp ce Grozav sฬฆi Rafinha au mai trecut pe laฬngaฬ deschiderea scorului. Unirea Slobozia nu a renuntฬฆat la luptaฬ sฬฆi a avut momentele sale de pericol, iฬn special prin Teodor Lungu, ale caฬrui sฬฆuturi de la distantฬฆaฬ au fost neutralizate de Raul Baฬlbaฬraฬu. Succesul pune capaฬt unei perioade dificile pentru Petrolul Ploiesฬฆti, care a obtฬฆinut doar 2 puncte iฬn precedentele 6 etape. Unirea Slobozia a ajuns la al 4-lea esฬฆec consecutiv, dupaฬ ce iฬn tur la Clinceni a reusฬฆit saฬ se impunaฬ cu scorul de 1-0. 03.02.2026, Ploiesฬฆti, Stadion: "Ilie Oanaฬ", ora: 16:00 Arbitru: Horia Gabriel Mladinovici (Bucuresฬฆti) Petrolul Ploiesฬฆti - Unirea Slobozia 1-0 A marcat: 1-0 Ricardinho (90+2) Petrolul Ploiesฬฆti: Baฬlbaฬraฬu โ Ricardinho, Papp, Roche, A. title: Mudofaaga yangi samolyot, amaldorlarning โsayohatchiโ bolalari va tekshirilayotgan savdo markazlari โ mahalliy dayjest.
content: Oโzbekiston Harbiy-havo kuchlari C-390 samolyotlariga ega boโladi, Rossiyadagi bayramga iqtidorli oโquvchilar qolib, amaldorlarning farzandlari bordi, Aviatorโdagi yongโindan keyin Toshkentda savdo markazlari xavfsizligi tekshiriladigan boโldi. Kunning shu va boshqa muhim xabarlari bilan Kun tafsiloti dasturida tanishtiramiz. Oโzbekiston Harbiy-havo kuchlari C-390 samolyotlariga ega boโladi Braziliyaning Embraer kompaniyasi 3 fevral kuni Singapurdagi aviasalonda Oโzbekiston Respublikasi C-390 Millennium transport samolyotining buyurtmachisi ekanini eโlon qildi. Taโkidlanishicha, Oโzbekiston Harbiy-havo kuchlari C-390 samolyotlaridan asosan transport va gumanitar missiyalarda foydalanadi va ushbu samolyotni ekspluatatsiya qiladigan Markaziy Osiyodagi birinchi davlatga aylanadi. XXI asrda loyihalashtirilgan C-390 Millennium oโz sinfidagi eng zamonaviy harbiy transport samolyoti boโlib, boshqa oโrta oโlchamli harbiy transport samolyotlariga qaraganda koโproq foydali yukni (26 tonna) koโtara oladi, tezroq (470 uzel) va uzoq masofalarga ucha oladi. Rossiyadagi bayramga iqtidorli oโquvchilar qolib, amaldorlarning farzandlari bordi Sankt-Peterburg shahrida har yili oโtkaziladigan โAlvon yelkanlarโ (โAlyye parusaโ) bayramiga borganlar safida Samarqand viloyati Maktabgacha va maktab taโlimi boshqarmasi rahbari Muzaffar Hamdamovning 2014 yilda tugโilgan oโgโli va 2011 yilda tugโilgan jiyani ham boโlgan. Shuningdek, boshqarmaning ayrim boโlimlari rahbarlari va masโul xodimlarining farzandlari ham mazkur safarda ishtirok etgani aytilmoqda. Manbaga koโra, bu oโquvchilarning birortasi xalqaro fan olimpiadalarida ishtirok etmagan, hatto ayrimlari tuman yoki shahar bosqichida ham qatnashmagan. Viloyat maktabgacha va maktab taโlimi boshqarmasi bergan izohga koโra, ayrim oโquvchilarning xorijga chiqish pasporti vaqtida tayyor boโlmagan va ayrimlarining ota-onalari safarga ruxsat bermagani sababli roโyxat oโzgartirilgan. Boshqarma oโquvchilar orasida boshliqning oโgโli va jiyani ham boโlganiga munosabat bildirmadi. Toshkentda savdo markazlari yongโin xavfsizligi boโyicha tekshirilmoqda Favqulodda vaziyatlarning oldini olish maqsadida Toshkent shahridagi savdo-koโngilochar maskanlarida yongโin xavfsizligi holati tekshirilmoqda. Profilaktik oโrganishlar jarayonida avtomatik yongโin oโchirish tizimlari, avtomatik yongโin haqida xabar berish vositalari, zaxira evakuatsiya yoโlaklari, yongโin oโchirish ichki joโmraklari, ยซChiqishยป elektron tablolari, shuningdek, birlamchi...

title: AQSh uzoq vaqt davomida Markaziy Osiyoga yetarlicha eโtibor bermadi โ Gor.
content: AQSh prezidentining maxsus vakili Serjio Gor Qirgโiziston poytaxti Bishkekda jurnalistlar bilan uchrashdi va Qoโshma Shtatlar bu mintaqaga ustuvor ahamiyat berishini va maโmuriyatning kelgusi uch yildagi siyosati aynan shu asosda qurilishini taโkidladi. Foto: AKIpress Elchi Gor AQSh uzoq vaqt davomida Markaziy Osiyoga yetarlicha eโtibor bermaganini taโkidladi. ยซMenda prezident Trampning bevosita oddiy koโrsatmasi bor - Qoโshma Shtatlar bu mintaqa bilan ishlashni xohlaydi, Qoโshma Shtatlar bu mintaqaga ustuvor ahamiyat beradi va biz maโmuriyatimizning kelgusi uch yildagi siyosatini aynan shu asosda qurmoqchimiz. Uzoq vaqt davomida AQSh bu mintaqaga yetarlicha eโtibor bermadi. Prezident Tramp boshchiligida biz buni oโzgartirmoqchimizยป, dedi Gor. Elchi AQSh bu mintaqadagi davlatlar bilan texnologiyalar sohasida hamkorlik qilmoqchi ekanini aytdi. ยซOโtgan yili Oq uydagi C5+1 sammitida hamma guvoh boโlganidek, bu ustuvorlik Oval kabinetdan kelib chiqmoqda. Bu biz eโtibor qaratadigan narsa, bu biz siyosatimizni quradigan narsa. Bu har ikki tomon uchun ham foydali. Bizda eng yaxshi texnologiyalar bor, bizda eng yaxshi imkoniyatlar bor. Biz mintaqa mamlakatlari va hamkorlar bilan hamkorlikni aynan shu yoโnalishda qurmoqchimiz. Men bugun forumda ishtirok etayotgan kompaniyalar roโyxatiga qaradim va adolatli ravishda aytmoqchimanki, bu mintaqaga tashrif buyurgan kompaniyalarning eng uzun va ahamiyatli roโyxati. Biz kelgusi oylar va yillarda shunga tayanamiz. Bu faqat boshlanishiยป, dedi Gor. Avvalroq, AQSh prezidentining Janubiy va Markaziy Osiyo boโyicha maxsus elchisi Serjio Gor 3-7 fevral kunlari Qirgโiziston va Oโzbekistonga tashrif buyurishi haqida xabar berilgan edi.

content: P. R. [ Beta ] Bivsฬi francuski ministar kulture Dzฬek Lang danas je iskljucฬio mogucฬnost ostavke na mjesto predsjednika Instituta arapskog svijeta (IMA), kao opravdanje navodecฬi svoju naivnost, nakon otkricฬa o njegovim vezama sa americฬkim finansijerom Dzฬefrijem Epstinom, koji je preminuo u zatvoru 2019. Lang je u intervjuu za francusku onlajn televiziju BFMTV upitan da li razmisฬlja o napusฬtanju funkcije, poput svoje cฬerke Karoline, koja je podnijela ostavku u sindikatu filmskih producenata. Lang (86) je odgovorio da o tome โni na trenutak nije pomislioโ. Pominjan u dokumentima koji otkrivaju veze sa milijarderom optuzฬenim za seksualne zlocฬine, Lang je naveo da nikada nije saznao za njegova krivicฬna djela. โVjerovatno sam jadan i naivan, nevin i budala od cฬovjekaโ, rekao je Lang, objasฬnjavajucฬi da nije trazฬio โizvode iz maticฬne knjige roฤenih ili krivicฬne dosijee od ljudi koje je upoznavaoโ. Epstina je opisao kao โstrastvenog ljubitelja umjetnosti i sฬarmantnog cฬovjekaโ, tvrdecฬi da je prekinuo svaki kontakt s njim cฬim je otkrivena Epstinova kriminalna priroda. Porodica Lang pominje se u dosijeima o Epstinu, narocฬito u dijelu koji se odnosi na ofsฬor fond koji je americฬki finansijer osnovao 2016. godine, kupovinu umjetnicฬkih djela i razlicฬite finansijske transakcije.

title: Komesar EU u posjeti Crnoj Gori, sa predstavnicima vlasti o bezbjednosti
content: V.N. Evropski komesar za unutrasฬnje poslove i migracije Magnus Bruner boravicฬe od 4. do 6. februara u Crnoj Gori i Albaniji, gdje cฬe sa predstavnicima nadlezฬnih institucija razgovarati o jacฬanju saradnje u oblastima unutrasฬnje bezbjednosti, upravljanja migracijama, kontrole granica, borbe protiv organizovanog kriminala i vladavine prava. To je saopsฬteno iz Evropske kucฬe. Rijecฬ je o njegovoj drugoj posjeti regionu, nakon ucฬesฬcฬa na ministarskom sastanku Zapadnog Balkana odrzฬanom u oktobru prosฬle godine. Iz Evropske kucฬe navode da ova posjeta potvrฤuje snazฬnu opredijeljenost Evropske unije da dodatno unaprijedi partnerstvo sa zemljama Zapadnog Balkana i pruzฬi podrsฬku Crnoj Gori i Albaniji na njihovom evrointegracionom putu i jacฬanju bezbjednosnih kapaciteta. โZemlje Zapadnog Balkana nasฬi su susjedi. Ukoliko zฬelimo da ocฬuvamo stabilnost i ureฤenost evropskog prostora, neophodno je da imamo izuzetno kvalitetne odnose sa susjedima. Zahvaljujucฬi bliskoj saradnji, u protekle tri godine zabiljezฬeno je smanjenje neregularnih migracija od 95 procenata. To pokazuje da nasฬa posvecฬenost efikasnom upravljanju granicama i operativnoj saradnji daje rezultate. Crna Gora i Albanija, kao zemlje predvodnice u procesu pristupanja Evropskoj uniji, daju direktan doprinos zajednicฬkoj bezbjednostiโ, porucฬio je komesar Bruner. Tokom boravka u Crnoj Gori, komesar Bruner cฬe se sastati sa potpredsjednikom Vlade za bezbjednost, odbranu, borbu protiv kriminala i unutrasฬnju politiku Aleksom Becฬicฬem, potpredsjednikom Vlade za vanjske i evropske poslove Filipom Ivanovicฬem, ministrom unutrasฬnjih poslova Danilom Sฬaranovicฬem, kao i direktorom Uprave policije Lazarom Sฬcฬepanovicฬem. "U fokusu razgovora bicฬe aktuelni bezbjednosni izazovi, upravljanje migracijama, usklaฤivanje vizne politike, suzbijanje krijumcฬarenja i unaprjeฤenje operativne saradnje sa agencijama Evropske unije", navode iz Evropske kucฬe. Komesar cฬe, takoฤe, ucฬestvovati u vazdusฬnom nadzoru drzฬavne granice sa Albanijom i Kosovom, uz korisฬcฬenje bespilotnih letjelica, te se sastati sa pripadnicima granicฬne policije Crne Gore i sluzฬbenicima Fronteksa.

content: Tuฬrkiyษ Prezidenti Rษcษb Tayyib ฦrdogฬan Azษrbaycan Prezidenti Iฬlham ฦliyevi "Zayed Iฬnsan Qardasฬงlฤฑgฬฤฑ Muฬkafatฤฑ" almasฤฑ muฬnasibษtilษ tษbrik edib. O, videomuฬraciษti zamanฤฑ builki muฬkafatlara layiq goฬruฬlษn Azษrbaycan Prezidenti Iฬlham ฦliyev ilษ Ermษnistanฤฑn Basฬง naziri Nikol Pasฬงinyanฤฑ uฬrษkdษn tษbrik edib: "Davamlฤฑ suฬlhuฬn bษrqษrar olmasฤฑ yolunda hษm Iฬlham ฦliyev qardasฬงฤฑmฤฑn atdฤฑgฬฤฑ cษsur addฤฑmlarฤฑ, hษm dษ cษnab Pasฬงinyanฤฑn ortaya qoydugฬu qษtiyyษtli iradษni son dษrษcษ ษhษmiyyษtli hesab etdiyimi xuฬsusilษ vurgฬulamaq istษyirษm. Mษqsษdi, ษhatษ dairษsi, mษzmunu vษ ruhu uฬzษrindษ iki tษrษfin dษ razฤฑlฤฑq ษldษ etdiyi razฤฑlasฬงmanฤฑn quฬvvษyษ minmษsi ilษ Qafqazฤฑn gษlษcษyindษ yeni bir sษhifษnin acฬงฤฑlacagฬฤฑna inanฤฑram". ฦrdogฬan bildirib ki, Tuฬrkiyษ boฬlgษdษ vษ duฬnyada ษmin-amanlฤฑq, suฬlh, rifah vษ sabitliyษ yoฬnษlษn buฬtuฬn tษsฬงษbbuฬslษri sษmimiyyษtlษ dษstษklษyir: "Qafqazda davamlฤฑ suฬlhuฬn bษrqษrar olmasฤฑ uฬcฬงuฬn uฬzษrimizษ nษ duฬsฬงuฬrsษ etmษyษ, ษdalษtษ ษsaslanan dostluq koฬrpuฬlษrinin qurulmasฤฑnda fษal sฬงษkildษ cฬงalฤฑsฬงmagฬa, insฬงallah, davam edษcษyik. Bu duฬsฬงuฬncษlษrlษ hษm Azษrbaycan Prezidenti cษnab ฦliyevi, hษm dษ Ermษnistanฤฑn Basฬง naziri cษnab Pasฬงinyanฤฑ bir daha tษbrik edirษm".

"Bildiyiniz kimi, Qฤฑrgฬฤฑz Respublikasฤฑ qonsฬงu doฬvlษtlษrlษ sษrhษd mษsษlษlษrini tษdricษn hษll etdi. 2025-ci ildษ Qฤฑrgฬฤฑzฤฑstan, Tacikistan vษ Oฬzbษkistan arasฤฑnda olan sษrhษdin uฬcฬง oฬlkษni birlษsฬงdirษn hissษsinษ dair razฤฑlasฬงma imzalandฤฑ. Uzun illษr ษrzindษ biz sษrhษd mษsษlษlษri ilษ bagฬlฤฑ cฬงagฬฤฑrฤฑsฬงlarฤฑ ardฤฑcฤฑl sฬงษkildษ hษll etmษyษ cฬงalฤฑsฬงmฤฑsฬงฤฑq. Nษticษdษ buฬtuฬn mษsษlษlษrin yalnฤฑz dostluq, mehriban qonsฬงuluq, qarsฬงฤฑlฤฑqlฤฑ dษstษk vษ qarsฬงฤฑlฤฑqlฤฑ etimad ruhunda hษll edilmษsi muฬmkuฬn oldu. Iฬnanฤฑram ki, Azษrbaycan vษ Ermษnistan eyni sฬงษkildษ suฬlh muฬnasibษtlษrinษ nail olacaqlar vษ iki xalq arasฤฑnda harmoniya, dostluq vษ firavanlฤฑq naminษ uzunmuฬddษtli ษmษkdasฬงlฤฑgฬฤฑn moฬhkษm tษmษlini qoyacaqlar. 2026-cฤฑ il uฬzrษ "Zayed Iฬnsan Qardasฬงlฤฑgฬฤฑ Muฬkafatฤฑ"nฤฑn Muฬnsiflษr Komitษsinin hoฬrmษtli uฬzvlษri, belษ nษcib mษqsษd naminษ cฬงalฤฑsฬงaraq vacib missiyanฤฑn davamlฤฑ irษlilษdilmษsinษ goฬrษ sizษ dษrin minnษtdarlฤฑgฬฤฑmฤฑ bildirirษm. Arzu edirษm ki, fษaliyyษtiniz duฬnya ictimaiyyษtini hษmrษylik, qarsฬงฤฑlฤฑqlฤฑ dษstษk vษ insan lษyaqษtinษ hoฬrmษt kimi dษyษrlษr ษtrafฤฑnda sษfษrbษr etsin", S.Japarov qeyd edib.

title: Barฤฑsฬงฤฑq zษiflik deyil, guฬc demษkdir:
content: Suฬlh sazisฬงi istiqamษtindษ Azษrbaycanฤฑn vษ Ermษnistanฤฑn ษldษ etdiyi irษlilษyisฬง tarixi ษhษmiyyษtษ malik doฬnuฬsฬง noฬqtษsidir. Publika.az xษbษr verir ki, bunu Qazaxฤฑstan Prezidenti Kasฤฑm-Jomart Tokayev "Zayed Iฬnsan Qardasฬงlฤฑgฬฤฑ Muฬkafatฤฑ"nฤฑn laureatlarฤฑna tษbrik videomuฬraciษtindษ deyib. O qeyd edib ki, duฬnyanฤฑn getdikcษ parcฬงalanmฤฑsฬง vษziyyษtษ duฬsฬงduฬyuฬ bir vaxtda belษ siyasษtin muฬstษsna mษnษvi vษ siyasi ษhษmiyyษti var: "Suฬlh sazisฬงi istiqamษtindษ Azษrbaycanฤฑn vษ Ermษnistanฤฑn ษldษ etdiyi irษlilษyisฬง tarixi ษhษmiyyษtษ malik doฬnuฬsฬง noฬqtษsidir. Bu, hษtta uzunmuฬddษtli muฬnaqisฬงษlษrin dialoq, mษsuliyyษt vษ tษmkinlik vasitษsilษ hษll oluna bilษcษyini nuฬmayisฬง etdirir. Qarsฬงฤฑdurma vษ ciddi parcฬงalanma xษtlษri ilษ sษciyyษlษndirilษn bir doฬvrdษ bu tษcruฬbษ goฬstษrir ki, barฤฑsฬงฤฑq zษiflik deyil, guฬc demษkdir. Qazaxฤฑstan uฬcฬงuฬn Azษrbaycan vษ Ermษnistan yaxฤฑn, qardasฬง oฬlkษlษrdir. Biz oฬlkษmizษ goฬstษrilmisฬง etimadฤฑ, o cuฬmlษdษn suฬlh danฤฑsฬงฤฑqlarฤฑnฤฑn muฬhuฬm mษrhษlษsinin Almatฤฑda kecฬงirilmษsini yuฬksษk qiymษtlษndiririk. Bu, irษli getmษyin yeganษ yolunun dialoq oldugฬu ilษ bagฬlฤฑ birgษ inamฤฑmฤฑzฤฑn tษzahuฬruฬduฬr. Qazaxฤฑstan Avrasiyada vษ daha genisฬง cogฬrafiyada ardฤฑcฤฑl olaraq suฬlhuฬ, etimadฤฑ vษ ษmษkdasฬงlฤฑgฬฤฑ guฬclษndirษn tษsฬงษbbuฬslษri dษstษklษyir. Sฬงeyx Zayed Muฬkafatฤฑ guฬcluฬ mษnษvi mesaj dasฬงฤฑyฤฑr. O, qardasฬงlฤฑgฬฤฑn tษhluฬkษsizlik, inkisฬงaf vษ insan lษyaqษtinin tษmin edilmษsi uฬcฬงuฬn universal prinsip vษ praktiki tษmษl oldugฬunu bir daha tษsdiqlษyir. Bu muฬkafat Sฬงeyx Zayed bin Sultan Al Nษhyanฤฑn doฬzuฬmluฬluฬk, qarsฬงฤฑlฤฑqlฤฑ hoฬrmษt vษ dinc birgษyasฬงayฤฑsฬงa ษsaslanan davamlฤฑ irsini tษcษssuฬm etdirir".

title: Tramp yarฤฑm milyardlฤฑq layihษsinin fotolarฤฑnฤฑ
content: ABSฬง Prezidenti Donald Tramp oฬzuฬnuฬn โTruth Socialโ hesabฤฑnda Agฬ Ev kompleksindษ insฬงa edilษcษk 300 milyon dollarlฤฑq (510 milyon AZN) yeni moฬhtษsฬงษm bal zalฤฑnฤฑn ilk maketini paylasฬงฤฑb. โQafqazinfoโ xษbษr verir ki, neoklassik uฬslubda dizayn edilษn bina uzun agฬ fasadฤฑ, huฬnduฬr suฬtunlarฤฑ vษ uฬcฬงbucaq frontonu ilษ diqqษt cฬงษkir. Layihษnin memarฤฑ Sฬงalom Baranesdir. Mษlumata goฬrษ, layihษyษ rษhbษrlik uฬcฬงuฬn yeni memar tษyin edilib, ษvvษlki memar Ceyms Makkriri isษ mษslษhษtcฬงi kimi fษaliyyษtini davam etdirษcษk. Prezident bu layihษni โoฬlkษyษ hษdiyyษโ adlandฤฑraraq, tikintinin doฬvlษt vษsaiti ilษ deyil, sฬงษxsi fondu vษ xeyriyyษ ianษlษri hesabฤฑna maliyyษlษsฬงษcษyini vurgฬulayฤฑb. Xatฤฑrladaq ki, bu tษsฬงษbbuฬs Agฬ Evin tarixindษ son onilliklษrin ษn iddialฤฑ memarlฤฑq layihษlษrindษn biri hesab olunur vษ rษsmi qษbullarฤฑn kecฬงirilmษsi uฬcฬงuฬn nษzษrdษ tutulub.

title: Efter mere end 400 aฬr: Sidste brev-ombรฆring med PostNord
content: Den 30. december leverer PostNord sit sidste brev og dermed stopper en tradition for brevuddeling i Danmark, der gaฬr tilbage til aฬr 1624. Distributionsselskabet Dansk Avis Omdeling (Dao) staฬr klar til at holde brevomdelingen i gang ved at fastholde dรฆkning i hele landet. Hans Peter Nissen, der er administrerende direktรธr hos Dao, tror ikke, at det vil krรฆve mange justeringer, da selskabet allerede har overtaget de fleste af brevene i 2025. - Vi regner med, at vores samlede omdelte antal produkter, som er fordelt paฬ pakker, magasiner, aviser og breve, vil stige fra omkring 150 millioner i 2025 til omkring 205 til 210 millioner i 2026. - Vi forventer, at omkring 70 millioner af disse vil vรฆre breve, siger han. I aฬr 2000 var der ifรธlge tal fra Trafikstyrelsen 1,44 milliarder brevforsendelser, mens dette tal var faldet til 122 millioner i 2024. Dette var ogsaฬ en af aฬrsagerne til, at PostNord tidligere meddelte, at selskabet lukker brevforretningen og nedlรฆgger 1500 stillinger. Hans Peter Nissen haฬber alligevel at holde brevomdelingen i live, selv om tallet har vรฆret faldende i alle aฬr fra 2000 til 2024. - Der er forsvundet cirka 90 procent af samtlige breve de seneste 20 aฬr. Vi haฬber, at vi kan holde fast i dem. - Vi haฬber, at de breve, der er tilbage, er til borgere, der gerne vil have det paฬ den maฬde, fortรฆller han. Det skal blandt andet lykkes ved at levere brevene hurtigere, forklarer Hans Peter Nissen. - Vi kan holde det her, fordi vi kan kombinere vores omdeling af aviser med breve, magasiner og pakker. Paฬ den maฬde har vi alle fire produkter med i tasken, naฬr vi deler ud, siger han. I 2024 blev befordringspligten afskaffet. Den betรธd indtil da, at PostNord var forpligtet til at omdele breve til hele landet. Da befordringspligten ikke er gรฆldende lรฆngere, mener Bent Greve, der er professor i offentlig รธkonomi paฬ Roskilde Universitet, og Landdistrikternes Fรฆllesraฬd, der reprรฆsenterer og varetager landdistrikternes interesser, at det kan faฬ negativ betydning for landdistrikterne. Det afviser Hans Peter Nissen. - Vi har omdelt i mere end 100 aฬr, og vi har omdelt i de lokale omraฬder. Vi samarbejder ogsaฬ med de lokale aviser derude, saฬ jeg vil sige, der er intet at frygte overhovedet. - Vi har selv en meget stor interesse i at opretholde den omdeling, fordi der er mange flere dagbladskunder i yderomraฬderne, end der er i byerne, siger han. Trafikstyrelsen har til Ritzau oplyst, at postmarkedet og kvaliteten af Daos brevomdeling vil...

Extremismus: Demo nach Urteil gegen Maja T.
content: Nach dem Urteil gegen Maja T. in Ungarn gehen Unterstuฬtzer in Berlin auf die Straรe. Warum es Kritik an dem Prozess gibt.Nach dem Urteil gegen die non-binaฬre Person Maja T. in Budapest sind in Berlin Hunderte Unterstuฬtzer aus der linken Szene auf die Straรe gegangen. Sie nahmen an einer Kundgebung in Kreuzberg teil und zogen anschlieรend in einem Demonstrationszug Richtung Friedrichshain. Die Polizei sprach von 550 Teilnehmern. Vereinzelt sei Pyrotechnik gezuฬndet worden. Auch in Potsdam rief die Gruฬne Jugend zu einer Demonstration auf. Vertreter der Organisation sprachen von einem Justizskandal. In einem totalitaฬren Rechtssystem in Ungarn habe Maja T. keine Chance auf einen fairen Prozess gehabt. Sie forderten, die Person nach Deutschland zuruฬckzuholen und ihr hier ein rechtsstaatliches Verfahren zu ermoฬglichen. Acht Jahre HaftDas Budapester Stadtgericht hat Maja T. zu einer Gefaฬngnisstrafe von acht Jahren verurteilt. Richter Jozsef Sos sah es als erwiesen an, dass die 25-jaฬhrige Person aus der linken Szene in Deutschland an blutigen Angriffen auf mutmaรliche Rechtsextremisten in Budapest beteiligt war. Rund 20 deutsche und andere mutmaรliche Linksextremisten sollen dabei neun Menschen verletzt haben, vier von ihnen schwer.Maja T. war im Dezember 2023 in Berlin verhaftet und im Juni 2024 von Deutschland an Ungarn ausgeliefert worden. Nach Ansicht des Bundesverfassungsgerichts war die Auslieferung in dieser Form rechtswidrig. Das zustaฬndige Berliner Kammergericht, das sie veranlasst hatte, habe die Haftumstaฬnde in Ungarn fuฬr die non-binaฬre Person nicht ausreichend gepruฬft, befand das hoฬchste deutsche Gericht. Politiker der Linken, der Gruฬnen und der SPD fordern die Ruฬckuฬberstellung von Maja T. nach Deutschland.

title: Cumhurbasฬงkanฤฑ Erdogฬan Tuฬrkiye-Mฤฑsฤฑr Iฬsฬง Forumu'nda konusฬงtu: Gazze'nin yeniden imarฤฑnda da birlikte cฬงalฤฑsฬงmak istiyoruz
content: Cumhurbasฬงkanฤฑ Recep Tayyip Erdogฬan, Mฤฑsฤฑr Cumhurbasฬงkanฤฑ Abdulfettah es-Sisi ile 15 milyar dolarlฤฑk ticaret hacmi hedefleri dogฬrultusunda yakฤฑn mesailerini kararlฤฑlฤฑkla suฬrduฬreceklerini bildirdi. Erdogฬan, bir otelde duฬzenlenen Tuฬrkiye-Mฤฑsฤฑr Iฬsฬง Forumu Kapanฤฑsฬง Oturumu'nda yaptฤฑgฬฤฑ konusฬงmada, Kahire ziyareti vesilesiyle isฬง duฬnyasฤฑnฤฑn secฬงkin temsilcileriyle bir araya gelmekten buฬyuฬk bir memnuniyet duydugฬunu belirtti. Cumhurbasฬงkanฤฑ Erdogฬan, ziyaretinin ilk anlarฤฑndan itibaren goฬsterdigฬi huฬsnuฬkabul icฬงin Mฤฑsฤฑr Cumhurbasฬงkanฤฑ Sisi ve Mฤฑsฤฑr makamlarฤฑna tesฬงekkuฬr etti. Yuฬksek Duฬzeyli Stratejik Iฬsฬงbirligฬi Konseyi Toplantฤฑsฤฑ'nda iki uฬlke arasฤฑndaki ticari ve ekonomik ilisฬงkileri de ayrฤฑntฤฑlฤฑ bicฬงimde ele aldฤฑklarฤฑnฤฑ vurgulayan Erdogฬan, her alanda kapsamฤฑ genisฬงleyen ilisฬงkilerin ahdi zeminini guฬcฬงlendirecek anlasฬงmalara imza attฤฑklarฤฑnฤฑ anฤฑmsattฤฑ. Mฤฑsฤฑr'ฤฑn gelecegฬine damga vuracak 2030 vizyonunu ilgiyle takip ettigฬini Sisi'ye soฬyledigฬini ifade eden Erdogฬan, soฬzlerini sฬงoฬyle suฬrduฬrduฬ: "Uluslararasฤฑ guฬndemi en cฬงok mesฬงgul eden gelisฬงmelerin merkezinde yer alan iki buฬyuฬk uฬlkeyiz. Aramฤฑzdaki isฬงbirligฬinin sadece uฬlkelerimiz icฬงin degฬil, boฬlgemizin istikrarฤฑna yaptฤฑgฬฤฑ katkฤฑya hep birlikte sฬงahit oluyoruz. Bunu oฬzellikle yatฤฑrฤฑm ve ticaret alanฤฑnda en verimli sฬงekilde kullanmak istiyoruz. Kuฬresel ekonomide bir yanda korumacฤฑlฤฑk ve icฬงe kapanma artarken, digฬer yanda refahฤฑn suฬrduฬruฬlebilmesi icฬงin isฬงbirligฬinin oฬnem kazandฤฑgฬฤฑ goฬruฬluฬyor. Giderek zorlasฬงan bu ortamda, sizlerin de destekleriyle ekonomilerimizin birlikte guฬcฬงlenerek buฬyuฬyebilecegฬine yuฬrekten inanฤฑyorum." "15 milyar dolar ticaret hacminin halen gerisindeyiz" Erdogฬan, ellerinin altฤฑnda degฬerlendirilmeyi bekleyen buฬyuฬk bir potansiyelinin oldugฬunu dile getirdi. Mฤฑsฤฑr'ฤฑn, Tuฬrkiye'nin Afrika'daki en buฬyuฬk ticaret ortagฬฤฑ oldugฬunu, Mฤฑsฤฑr'la ticaret hacminin 8 milyar dolarฤฑ asฬงtฤฑgฬฤฑnฤฑ goฬrduฬklerini vurgulayan Erdogฬan, sฬงu degฬerlendirmelerde bulundu: "Mฤฑsฤฑr'ฤฑn en cฬงok ihracat yaptฤฑgฬฤฑ uฬlkeler arasฤฑnda yuฬzde 7,4 pay ile uฬcฬงuฬncuฬ, en cฬงok ithalat yaptฤฑgฬฤฑ uฬlkeler arasฤฑnda ise yuฬzde 3,4 pay ile yedinci sฤฑradayฤฑz. Bunlar elbette bizleri umutlandฤฑran, bizleri cesaretlendiren rakamlar ancak hedefimiz olan 15 milyar dolar ticaret hacminin halen gerisindeyiz. Alฤฑnan tuฬm tedbirlere ragฬmen yasฬงanan bu durumda, duฬnyada bozulan isฬง ortamฤฑnฤฑn etkili oldugฬunu siz isฬง insanlarฤฑmฤฑz cฬงok iyi biliyor. Biz de liderler olarak bunun farkฤฑndayฤฑz....

title: Recorde de atletas: veja nuฬmeros e agenda do Brasil nos Jogos de Inverno
content: O Brasil chega para os Jogos de Inverno Milaฬo-Cortina com recorde de atletas e nuฬmeros que chamam a atencฬงaฬo. A delegacฬงaฬo verde e amarela tem, ao todo, 60 integrantes, sendo 14 atletas (e um reserva) em cinco modalidades. Eฬ um aumento de 40% em relacฬงaฬo aฬ edicฬงaฬo de Pequim, em 2022, quando o paiฬs foi representado por 10 atletas. As bagagens despachadas superam treฬs toneladas, com 115 kg soฬ de equipamentos meฬdicos e esportivos, enquanto os uniformes somam 4.036 pecฬงas dos dois fornecedores oficiais: Moncler, para os desfiles de abertura e encerramento e o material do esqui alpino, e adidas, que vestiraฬ a delegacฬงaฬo e todas as demais modalidades. Combinadas, saฬo 2,6 toneladas de roupas. Haveraฬ uma equipe de suporte em cada uma das bases para dar apoio constante, resolver os problemas que acontecerem. Temos ouvido que as estradas naฬo estaฬo nas melhores condicฬงoฬes porque tem nevado bastante, entaฬo isso vai agregar um fator de complexidade. Comecฬงamos laฬ atraฬs e tudo foi feito com muito carinho. Chegamos na Itaฬlia haฬ alguns dias e jaฬ passamos pela fase de trabalhar intensamente para montar todas as malas de cada um dos atletas. Joyce Ardies, Gerente de Jogos Internacionais do COB Os Jogos teraฬo duas cidades-sede, Milaฬo e Cortina, e instalacฬงoฬes esportivas espalhadas por um raio de mais de 400 km. O Time Brasil estaraฬ nas disputas em Bormio, Livigno, Tesero e Cortina d'Ampezzo, locais que ficam em montanhas diferentes e distantes entre si. "O maior impacto para noฬs eฬ constatar que o Time Brasil tem footprint em quatro bases diferentes, pensando nas competicฬงoฬes, mais a Casa Brasil, em Milaฬo, por onde nossos atletas tambeฬm iraฬo passar. Entaฬo, cada base tem uma funcionalidade autoฬnoma. Isso eฬ muito importante. E para isso pensamos em uma distribuicฬงaฬo de material com folga. Fora o trabalho de fazer este material chegar ateฬ as montanhas", conta Joyce. "Eฬ uma logiฬstica sensiฬvel, mas jaฬ temos tudo mapeado. Estamos confiantes que podemos ter bons resultados na competicฬงaฬo. Seguimos adiante na nossa entrega. Nossa tarefa eฬ prover a todos estes atletas que teraฬo a melhor estrutura possiฬvel para que eles possam apresentar seu melhor desempenho", acrescentou Jorge Bichara, Consultor de Esportes do COB Confira a agenda dos brasileiros: Bobsled Instalacฬงaฬo esportiva: Cortina Sliding Center Cidade/Regiaฬo: Cortina d'Ampezzo (Veneto) Atletas brasileiros: Edson Bindilatti, Davidson de Souza, Rafael Souza, Luiฬs Bacca e Gustavo...

Ministar pred sudom: Sฬta smo sve cฬuli sa prvog suฤenja Nikoli Selakovicฬu za Generalsฬtab
content: Slobodan Maricฬicฬ - BBC novinar [ BBC ] 04. 02. 2026. 19:21 >> 19:50 Pred takozvanim Specijalnim sudom u Beogradu pocฬelo je suฤenje ministru kulture Nikoli Selakovicฬu za slucฬaj Generalsฬtab - sฬta smo sve cฬuli? Bivsฬi je ministar pravde, spoljnih poslova, rada i zaposฬljavanja, trenutno prvi cฬovek resora kulture, ali i prvi ministar, otkako se Srbija osamostalila, pred sudom - Nikola Selakovicฬ. Barem kada je recฬ o onim koji su aktuelni , a ne bivsฬi . Na to kako cฬe dalje izledati karijera i biografija visokog zvanicฬnika vladajucฬe Srpske napredne stranke (SNS), znatno bi mogao da uticฬe ishod suฤenja koje je hladnog i vetrovitog 4. februara pocฬelo pred Posebnim odeljenjem Visฬeg suda u Beogradu. Selakovicฬa i josฬ troje drzฬavnih zvanicฬnika Tuzฬilasฬtvo za organizovani kriminal (TOK) optuzฬilo je za โnezakonitosti prilikom skidanja svojstva kulturnog dobra nad zgradama Generalsฬtabaโ u centru Beograda. Na prvom rocฬisฬtu su se izjasnili da nisu krivi. Pri dolasku na sud u pratnji advokata, meฤu kojima je i Vladimir ฤukanovicฬ, takoฤe visoki zvanicฬnik SNS-a, docฬekala ih grupa studenata, demonstranata i opozicionih poslanika, koji su im zvizฬdali i vikali im โlopovi, lopoviโ. Do postupka dolazi usred velikih neizvesnosti u oblasti pravosuฤa, pre svega zbog donosฬenja takozvanih โMrdicฬevih zakonaโ, nazvanih po njihovom predlagacฬu Ugljesฬi Mrdicฬu, poslaniku SNS-a u Narodnoj skupsฬtini. Novi set zakona, za koje vlasti tvrde da cฬe doprineti โboljem i efikasnijemโ pravosudnom sistemu, opozicija i pojedini pravni strucฬnjaci vide kao pokusฬaj da se pravosuฤe stavi pod kontrolu vlade, a posebno da se ogranicฬi mocฬ TOK-a. โDeo su obojene revolucije, udarili su na drzฬavu, krenuli sa hapsฬenjima ministara SNS-a, hteli da na kraju da uhapse predsednika Vucฬicฬa i srusฬe drzฬavu, da budemo otvoreniโ, izjavio je nedavno Mrdicฬ. Kao jedan od razloga cฬestih napada vlasti na TOK, uz postupke protiv ministara Gorana Vesicฬa i Tomislava Momirovicฬa zbog pada nadstresฬnice zฬeleznicฬke stanice u Novom Sadu, kada je poginulo 16 ljudi, mnogi pre svega isticฬu โslucฬaj Generalsฬtabโ. To su sve faze urusฬavanja koncepta vladavine prava u Srbiji, kazฬe Zoran Krsticฬ, profesor Fakulteta politicฬkih nauka Univerziteta u Beogradu, za BBC na srpskom. โImam utisak da je to sve temeljno i tendenciozno smisฬljeno i da se dugo radilo na tome da se sve definitivno i prakticฬno stavi pod kontrolu izvrsฬne vlastiโ, isticฬe. U tom smislu, situaciju oko TOK-a i suฤenje...

title: Krapovicฬ: Crna Gora podrzฬava napore usmjerene ka smanjenju tenzija na Bliskom istoku
content: [ Mina ] Crna Gora podrzฬava sve napore usmjerene ka smanjenju tenzija na Bliskom istoku kroz politicฬki dijalog i odgovorne mjere, koje vode ka pravednom, odzฬivom i mirnom rjesฬenju, porucฬio je ministar odbrane Dragan Krapovicฬ. Kako je saopsฬteno iz Ministarstva odbrane, Krapovicฬ se sastao sa novoimenovanim izaslanikom odbrane Izraela za Crnu Goru, Tal Mastom, u okviru njegove nastupne posjete tom resoru. Krapovicฬ je cฬestitao Mastu na imenovanju, naglasivsฬi znacฬaj kontinuiranog dijaloga i partnerskih odnosa sa Izraelom. โMinistar je podsjetio na uspjesฬno realizovane zajednicฬke projekte u proteklom periodu, koji su umnogome dopinijeli modernizaciji kapaciteta Vojske Crne Gore (VCG)โ, kazฬe se u saopsฬtenju. Iz Ministarstva su rekli da je Krapovicฬ informisao Masta o odbrambenim prioritetima za naredni period, kao i o doprinosu VCG kolektivnoj bezbjednosti. โMast je istakao razvijenu saradnju koju su Crna Gora i Izrael uspostavile u proteklom periodu na polju odbrane, posebno u domenu nabavke vojne opremeโ, kazฬe se u saopsฬtenju. Navodi se da je on naglasio spremnost Izraela da pruzฬi punu podrsฬku Crnoj Gori u procesu modernizacije VCG, kao i otvorenost za pronalazฬenje novih modaliteta odbrambene saradnje. Tokom sastanka, kako su rekli iz Ministarstva, razgovarano je o aktuelnim bezbjednosnim izazovima, sa fokusom na slozฬenu bezbjednosnu situaciju na Bliskom istoku. โU tom kontekstu, Krapovicฬ je naglasio da Crna Gora podrzฬava sve napore usmjerene ka smanjenju tenzija u tom regionu kroz politicฬki dijalog i odgovorne mjere, koje vode ka pravednom, odzฬivom i mirnom rjesฬenju, a sve u interesu dugorocฬne stabilnosti i bezbjednosti ovog regionaโ, kazฬe se u saopsฬtenju. Kako su naveli iz Ministarstva odbrane, Mast se sastao i sa nacฬelnikom Generalsฬtaba VCG Miodragom Vuksanovicฬem. โNa sastanku je razgovarano o dosadasฬnjoj saradnji u oblasti odbrane, kao i o mogucฬnostima njenog daljeg unapreฤenja kroz zajednicฬke projekte i razmjenu iskustavaโ, navodi se u saopsฬtenju.

title: China, UNICEF cooperate in supporting Indonesia's free school meal programs in Papua
content: JAKARTA, Feb. 4 (Xinhua) -- A joint assessment of the Chinese government and UNICEF's aid to Indonesia's free nutritious meal program was held from Tuesday to Wednesday in Jayapura, the capital of Indonesia's eastern province of Papua. Regional Secretary of Papua province Christian Sohilait expressed his gratitude for the Chinese government's selfless assistance, which has enabled vulnerable groups in the province, such as children and pregnant women, to receive more nutritious and balanced meals, and for school-age children to receive better education. Li Hongwei, minister-counselor of the Chinese Embassy in Indonesia, stated that the project has already achieved positive results, benefiting nearly 140,000 people and bringing tangible benefits to local children, women and communities. It is hoped that all parties will continue to ensure the project's implementation and quality, continuously improve the nutritional status of children and women in Papua, extend the project's reach to more people, and create a model of trilateral cooperation, Li said. โ

title: Namibia ends 2025 with strong trade balance driven by mineral exports
content: WINDHOEK, Feb. 4 (Xinhua) -- Namibia closed 2025 with a markedly improved trade position, as stronger mineral exports and a sharp decline in imports helped narrow the country's trade deficit in December, according to the latest trade statistics released Tuesday by the Namibia Statistics Agency (NSA). NSA Statistician General Alex Shimuafeni said the southern African country recorded a trade deficit of 393 million Namibian dollars (about 24.6 million U.S. dollars) in December, a major improvement from the 4.4-billion Namibian dollar deficit registered in November. The year-end outcome also compared favorably with December 2024, when Namibia posted a trade surplus, he added. According to Shimuafeni, exports rose 7.5 percent month on month to 10.7 billion Namibian dollars, while imports declined 22.9 percent to 11.1 billion dollars, reflecting reduced spending on key imported goods. For the full year, Namibia's cumulative exports increased to 125.7 billion Namibian dollars, up from 116.8 billion dollars in 2024, while cumulative imports declined to 150.7 billion dollars from 158.5 billion dollars, pointing to an overall improvement in the country's external trade position in 2025, the statistics agency said. Export performance in December was driven largely by mining commodities, with non-monetary gold, diamonds, and uranium remaining the main contributors to export earnings, it said, adding that non-mineral exports, including fish, fruit, and nuts, also supported export growth, aided by seasonal agricultural output. The sharp decline in imports was mainly attributed to lower purchases of petroleum oils, fertilizers, industrial machinery, and manufactured metal products, easing pressure on the trade balance toward the end of the year. South Africa remained Namibia's largest trading partner for both exports and imports in 2025, with China, Botswana, Zambia, and the Netherlands among key export destinations, and China, India, Oman, and Zambia among the main sources of imports, the agency said. Trade with Africa strengthened in December, with Namibia recording a 502-million-Namibian-dollar surplus as exports to the continent exceeded imports, and intra-African trade accounting for more than half of total exports under the African Continental Free Trade Area. โ

title: UNSMIL voices dismay over killing of Muammar Gaddafi's son
content: TRIPOLI, Feb. 4 (Xinhua) -- The United Nations Support Mission in Libya (UNSMIL) on Wednesday expressed dismay over the killing of Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of the late Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi, calling for restraint from all parties. In a statement posted on its official Facebook page, UNSMIL condemned the targeted killings, emphasizing their undermining of the rule of law. It also warned against actions that could escalate tensions or jeopardize security and stability nationwide, while reaffirming the importance of a comprehensive political solution as the only path to achieving long-term stability and development in Libya. Abdullah Othman Abdurrahim, a member of al-Islam Gaddafi's political team, announced his death on Tuesday, stating that four masked gunmen carried out a "treacherous operation" by storming his residence at noon in the city of Zintan. The attackers reportedly disabled surveillance cameras before a "direct armed confrontation" ensued. โ

title: China's trade with other APEC economies exceeds 125 tln yuan from 2021 to 2025
content: GUANGZHOU, Feb. 4 (Xinhua) -- Trade between China and other Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) economies during the 14th Five-Year Plan period (2021-2025) totaled 125.49 trillion yuan (about 18.05 trillion U.S. dollars), which was up 39.4 percent from the previous five years, official data showed on Wednesday. The figure for 2025 alone came in at 26.29 trillion yuan, accounting for nearly 60 percent of China's total foreign trade that year, according to the first plenary meeting of the 2026 APEC Sub-Committee on Customs Procedures (SCCP) held in Guangzhou, the capital of south China's Guangdong Province. Zhao Zenglian, deputy head of the General Administration of Customs (GAC), highlighted the Asia-Pacific region's role as the world's growth engine, noting that its total economic volume now represents over 60 percent of the global economy. As SCCP chair for 2026, the GAC has proposed three initiatives: deepening cooperation under the smart customs partnership, enhancing supply-chain resilience and accelerating digital transformation. โ

title: Bulgaria dismantles largest illegal cigarette factory: Prosecutor's Office
content: SOFIA, Feb. 4 (Xinhua) -- Bulgarian authorities, working in collaboration with British partners, have dismantled the largest illegal cigarette manufacturing facility ever uncovered in the country, the Prosecutor's Office announced on Wednesday. Cigarettes and approximately 13.8 tons of tobacco were found at the facility, which was located near the town of Batanovtsi, about 37 km west of the Bulgarian capital Sofia, the prosecutors said in a press release. Authorities also seized a truck loaded with more than 10 million cigarettes produced at the illegal factory. The excise duty owed on the seized illegal excise goods -- cigarettes and tobacco -- exceeded 2.8 million euros (3.3 million U.S. dollars), according to the press release. Authorities discovered the factory less than three weeks after the start of production, and the cigarettes were primarily intended for export, it added. The factory had a fully integrated production cycle, with machines for tobacco processing, cigarette production and packaging, the press release said, adding that it also included a warehouse, sleeping quarters for about 20 people, and a kitchen. The workers were foreign nationals. Several individuals have been identified in connection with the factory's illegal activities, and an investigation is ongoing. (1 euro = 1.18 U.S. dollar) โ

title: South Africa remains eligible for AGOA extension: minister
content: JOHANNESBURG, Feb. 4 (Xinhua) -- South Africa remains eligible for the extension of the African Growth and Opportunity Act (AGOA) through the end of 2026, Minister of Trade, Industry, and Competition Parks Tau has said. In a statement issued on Tuesday evening, Tau welcomed Washington's one-year extension of AGOA, noting that it provides short-term relief and certainty for South African exporters, but expressed concern over the brief duration of the extension. "We are, however, concerned by the short nature of the extension, and we hope the United States will use this opportunity provided by the short extension toward a program that will provide certainty around investment and purchasing decisions," he said. Tau added that South Africa continues to engage "constructively" with the U.S. administration in discussions aimed at reducing the 30 percent tariff imposed on South African goods in August 2025, stressing "a healthy trade relationship benefits both our countries." Established in 2000, AGOA grants eligible African countries duty-free access to the U.S. market for selected products, including vehicles, clothing, and agricultural goods. The program expired on Sept. 30, 2025, but will be applied retroactively from that date, U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer confirmed after U.S. President Donald Trump signed the extension into law on Tuesday. โ

title: Enda nรฆrmere toppsjiktet
Croatia's inflation last month rises, second highest in Eurozone
content: ZAGREB, Feb. 4 (Xinhua) -- Croatia's annual inflation rate rose to 3.4 percent in January, making it the Eurozone country with the second-highest price growth last month, according to Croatia's Central Bureau of Statistics (CBS) and the Eurostat on Wednesday. In January, services increased by 7.2 percent year-on-year, while prices of food, beverages and tobacco rose by 3 percent. Energy prices climbed by 3.7 percent, the CBS said. By comparison, the annual consumer price growth across the Eurozone stood at 1.7 percent in January, and only Slovakia, with an inflation of 4.2 percent, recorded higher inflation rate than Croatia last month, according to the Eurostat. The Croatian government has said that it is helping the most vulnerable groups to reduce inflationary pressures and make their lives easier. โ

title: Iranian intelligence forces seize 14-tonne cold weapons
content: TEHRAN, Feb. 4 (Xinhua) -- Iran's intelligence forces seized a 14-tonne cache of concealed cold weapons and "items usable in riots" in the northwestern province of West Azarbaijan, the semi-official Fars news agency reported Wednesday. The smuggled consignment, intercepted at the northwestern border, included high-voltage electroshock weapons, concealable batons, daggers, knives, and laser sights, the news agency said. Some of the weapons were disguised as everyday objects, such as flashlights, remote controls and cosmetics, it added The report said a foreign national was arrested during the operation. โ

title: Besoldung: Hessen will Beamtenbesoldung 2026 verfassungskonform machen
content: Paukenschlag Ende 2021: Hessens Beamtenbezahlung hat laut einem Gericht gegen die Verfassung verstoรen. Seitdem laฬuft diese Debatte. Nun macht der Innenminister eine neue Ankuฬndigung.Gut vier Jahre nach einer gerichtlichen Niederlage der damaligen hessischen Regierung wegen der Besoldung hat Innenminister Roman Poseck (CDU) angekuฬndigt, die Bezahlung der Beamten noch 2026 verfassungskonform zu gestalten. "Die Tarifgespraฬche fuฬr Hessen finden Ende Maฬrz statt. Danach wird es voraussichtlich eine Anpassung der Beamtenbesoldung geben, die durch ein Gesetz geregelt wird", teilte Poseck der Deutschen Presse-Agentur in Zeiten angespannter staatlicher Finanzen mit. Noch in diesem Jahr sollten die noฬtigen Schritte dafuฬr unternommen werden. Zuvor hatte die "Frankfurter Rundschau" daruฬber online berichtet. Ziel sei es, dabei auch die Maรstaฬbe des juฬngsten Urteils des Bundesverfassungsgerichts "zu beruฬcksichtigen und fuฬr Hessen eine Besoldung zu schaffen, die diesen Anforderungen entspricht", teilte der Minister der dpa mit.Niederlage der Landesregierung vor Gericht 2021Ende 2021 hatte der Verwaltungsgerichtshof in Kassel entschieden, dass die Beamtenbesoldung in Hessen teilweise zu niedrig war und gegen das Grundgesetz verstieร. Beamtinnen und Beamte hatten demnach von 2013 bis 2020 zu wenig Geld bekommen. Im November 2025 urteilte das Bundesverfassungsgericht, dass die Besoldung zahlreicher Berliner Beamte etliche Jahre lang verfassungswidrig gewesen war. Seit Langem gibt es in vielen Bundeslaฬndern Streit uฬber die Hoฬhe der Besoldung, der immer wieder die Karlsruher Richter beschaฬftigt. Minister: Aktueller "Handlungsauftrag fuฬr alle Bundeslaฬnder"Poseck bezeichnete das juฬngste Urteil als "Handlungsauftrag fuฬr alle Bundeslaฬnder". Dies nehme man auch in Hessen sehr ernst. Der CDU-Politiker war einst hoฬchster Richter Hessens. Der Beamtenbund (dbb) in Hessen begruฬรte Posecks Ankuฬndigung einer "Reparatur" der Besoldung noch in diesem Jahr. Diese sei "nun auch wirklich an der Zeit gewesen". Beamtenbund noch etwas misstrauischEine gewisse Skepsis bleibe jedoch: Bereits im Zuge des Urteils des Verwaltungsgerichtshofs 2021 habe Ministerpraฬsident Boris Rhein (CDU) eine "Reparatur" angekuฬndigt. "Die Landesregierung hatte sogar erste Schritte unternommen, hatte den begonnenen Weg zuletzt aber nicht weiter beschritten", ergaฬnzte der dbb. title: Uncovering hidden quantum landscapes
content: Feb 04, 2026 Uncovering hidden quantum landscapes Scientists have developed an innovative microscope that uses the ultimate sensor - a single atom - to reveal the invisible energy terrain that guides electrons inside quantum materials. ( Nanowerk News ) Imagine trying to read Braille while wearing thick winter gloves; you might feel the general shape of the book, but the story remains a mystery. For decades, this has been the reality for physicists trying to "feel" the invisible energy landscapes that govern how electrons move in quantum materials. Now, researchers at the Weizmann Institute of Science have taken the gloves off. In a new study published in Nature ( Unknown journal , "Imaging the sub-moireฬ potential using an atomic single electron transistor" ), a team led by Prof. Shahal Ilani unveils the Atomic Single Electron Transistor (Atomic SET), a scanning microscope that uses a single atom as an ultra-sensitive quantum sensor. By scanning this atomic probe across a material, the researchers achieved images with 100 times better resolution than existing state-of-the-art techniques, revealing an unexpectedly intense energy landscape that defies theoretical predictions. The Atomic SET opens a new frontier of quantum discovery, promising to reveal the secrets of exotic states of matter that could power the technologies of tomorrow. A single atomic defect acts as a new type of microscope to reveal the electrostatic potential landscape steering the behavior of electrons in quantum materials. (Image: Weizmann Institute of Science) From invisible forces to visible maps Inside every solid material, electrons move through an invisible energy landscape shaped by the materialโs atoms. This landscape determines whether a material conducts electricity, becomes superconducting or hosts entirely new quantum states. Until now, this energy profile was inaccessible to direct imaging because it exists at length scales that are extremely difficult to probe. The Atomic SET overcomes this limitation by enabling direct, high-resolution measurements of the electrostatic potential inside quantum materials. The technique is implemented using the groupโs recently developed Quantum Twisting Microscope (QTM) platform, which brings a van der Waals material mounted on a scanning tip into contact with a second van der Waals material on a flat substrate, allowing one to be scanned laterally with respect to the other. title: Trans American Fiber to extend TAM-1 cable to Jamaica
content: Trans American Fiber System will extend its TAM-1 submarine cable project to Jamaica under an agreement with the government of Jamaica aimed at strengthening the countryโs digital infrastructure. โWe are laying the foundations for higher economic growth, stronger competitiveness, broader access to education and employment, and greater national resilience,โ Prime Minister Andrew Holness said during the signing ceremony. According to Holness, 54% of the countryโs traffic currently goes through a single subsea cable. TAM-1 is a regional 7,000km network connecting Colombia, the northern Caribbean (Puerto Rico, US Virgin Islands and British Virgin Islands), Mexico and Central America (Guatemala, Honduras, Costa Rica and Panama). A purpose-built Jamaican branch could be added quickly, as the cable passes just 220km south of the island. The branch, comprising a fiber pair with up to 20 terabits per second of bandwidth, is expected to start construction in the fourth quarter of 2026. โWe expect the cable will be fully operational by the third quarter of 2027,โ energy, transport and telecommunications minister Daryl Vaz said. Ground facilities will be carrier neutral and open to all ISPs, content delivery networks, cloud providers and government institutions. Once finalized, the new branch is expected to reduce international bandwidth costs by up to 99%, according to government estimates. According to Trans American Fiber System CEO Julio Bran, the company is โabout 60% en route in terms of installing a 7,000-kilometer cable system across the entire regionโ. โIf you look at the route, we cover from the US to the USVI to Puerto Rico to Haiti, Jamaica and the smaller countries as well in Central America. So, we try to cover the entire Caribbean region and not only the bigger economies,โ Bran said. Phase one of the cable is nearly complete, with anchorages finalized and contracts signed in Honduras and Costa Rica , among other countries. (The original version of this content was written in English)

title: CNE participates in the start of the construction phase of the HVDC KimalโLo Aguirre Transmission Line
content: This press release was published in English using an automatic translation system CNE The National Energy Commission (CNE) took part in the ceremony marking the start of the construction phase of the KimalโLo Aguirre high-voltage direct current (HVDC) transmission line, one of the most important electricity infrastructure projects for the National Electric System. Representing the CNE was Mauricio Funes, acting executive secretary, who participated together with the bi-minister of Economy and Energy, Aฬlvaro Garciฬa, the minister of the Environment, Maisa Rojas, and the minister of Finance, Nicolaฬs Grau, as well as public authorities and representatives of the electricity sector. The KimalโLo Aguirre project will structurally reinforce the country's power transmission system, increasing the energy transport capacity between the north and the central area, which is key to greater integration of renewable energies and to strengthening the security and resilience of the national power system. During the activity, contact was also made with the teams that are currently working at the Kimal Substation, located in the municipality of Mariฬa Elena, Antofagasta Region, highlighting the technical and operational progress of the project in its initial execution stage. The KimalโLo Aguirre HVDC Transmission Line is a strategic project for Chile's energy development, aligned with the objectives of energy transition, system efficiency, and a safe and reliable electricity supply for the population.

content: El Olimpia ya disputoฬ su partido de ida como local y ahora le toca enfrentar al Ameฬrica en la vuelta de la Copa de Campeones de Concacaf, donde se definiraฬ queฬ equipo avanzaraฬ a los octavos de final.La serie promete emociones intensas, con ambos clubes conscientes de que cualquier detalle puede decidir el pase.El partido se jugaraฬ el mieฬrcoles 11 de febrero a las 19:00 horas, en el Estadio Ciudad de los Deportes en la Ciudad de Meฬxico, escenario donde los aficionados conoceraฬn al ganador del enfrentamiento entre los mexicanos y los hondurenฬos.Lea tambieฬn: Agustiฬn title: Colombia courts investors for grid expansion works
content: Colombia has opened a bidding process for power transmission works in the eastern department of Casanare, part of broader plans to reinforce electricity supply to rural areas. The winning bidder will be responsible for building and operating a 230kV substation at Aguaclara and associated high voltage power lines, according to tender documents published by energy ministry planning unit UPME . The deadline for the completion of construction work is December 31, 2030, when a 25-year operating concession will begin. Bids are due on August 6 and results are scheduled to be published later the same month. Proposals for a related supervisory contract are due on May 6, with the winner slated to be announced on June 1. The project forms part of the governmentโs 2022โ36 transmission expansion plan, which seeks to cover growing demand, address dispatch restrictions and support the connection of renewable energy capacity. Last month, UPME launched a competitive tender for the Nueva Lorica grid expansion project in northern Cordoba department. More information, in Spanish, can be seen by opening the document links in the top-right corner of the screen. (The original version of this content was written in English)

title: Argentine province launches US$60mn roadworks tender
content: Argentinaโs Mendoza province launched an 88.9 billion (bn) peso (US$61.5 million) tender to rehabilitate and upgrade a 15.7km section of National Route No. 40 , which serves as the southern access road to the provinceโs namesake capital. Works are divided into two sections: Section 1 (26.7bn pesos) covers 7.72km between the roadโs intersection with Provincial Route No 10 and the intersection with Provincial Route No 2, according to bidding documents. Works in this stretch include turning it into a six-lane road, building three new bridges and widening two existing ones. Section 2 (26.7bn pesos) entails rehabilitating 8km between the intersection with Provincial Route No 2 and the Palmira detour. Bids will be opened on February 20, documents can be seen at Mendozaโs procurement website under CUC No. 40. Funding will come from a US$1.02bn compensation fund established in 2024 to settle a lawsuit launched by the Mendoza government against the federal administration over industrial promotion policies pushed by the latter in the mid-1990โs, which Mendoza claims were detrimental for its local economy. (The original version of this content was written in English)
creator: bnamericas english

title: Chile: Electric Coordinator reports progress on measures to strengthen system security
content: This press release was published in English using an automatic translation system National Electric Coordinator Almost a year after the event that affected the continuity of the electricity supply between Arica and Los Lagos, the National Electric Coordinator has promoted a set of technical and organizational measures aimed at strengthening the security, reliability, and continuous operation of the National Electric System (SEN), as well as reducing the risk of events of similar magnitude occurring. What happened on February 25, 2025 marked a turning point in risk management and in planning the operation of the power system. This meant the deployment of a robust technical agenda, structured around four lines of action: prevention, fault containment, service restoration, and continuous improvement, with more than 20 associated concrete measures. โOur commitment has been clear from the very beginning: to act with full transparency, technical rigor and institutional collaboration. We have strengthened our internal capabilities and promoted relevant adjustments in the operation and in the system standards, with the aim of reducing the probability and impact of similar events,โ said Juan Carlos Olmedo, chairman of the Board of Directors of the Coordinator. Among the main measures already implemented are: Additionally, the technical analyses already carried out have made it possible to describe and characterize the causes and sequences of the event. These analyses were reviewed and validated by national and international institutions, such as the Universidad de Chile and the Electric Power Research Institute (EPRI) of the United States. Both studies agreed on the identification of relevant technical and regulatory gaps, supporting the improvement proposals promoted by the Coordinator. The Coordinator emphasizes that strengthening the National Electric System does not depend on a single institution, but on the coordinated and responsible actions of all actors in the electric sector: generators, transmitters, distributors, large consumers, and regulatory authorities. โToday we have a system that is better prepared than a year ago, but the work is not yet finished. It is essential to persevere in technical and regulatory compliance by companies, to accelerate the incorporation of new technologies, new transmission infrastructure projects, and to strengthen operational discipline. The security and resilience of the power system is a national task,โ emphasized...

title: US software stocks hit by Anthropic wake-up call on AI disruption
content: U.S. software stocks extended their slide on Wednesday, driven by fears of disruption caused by artificial intelligence, with some analysts warning of more volatility as investors assess whether the challenge is existential for the sector.The selloff was triggered by a new legal tool from Anthropic, which showed the AI industry's growing push into industries that can unlock lucrative enterprise revenue needed to fund massive investments in the technology.That push has sparked fears of disruption in industries ranging from finance to law and coding.Grappling with slower progress in the development of the AI models that power their technology, startups such as OpenAI and Anthropic are under pressure to justify their steep valuations.Their strategy is reminiscent of how Amazon disrupted several industries by first winning a niche online book market and then using that foothold to build a business that now spans retail, cloud and logistics.Some analysts said the success of AI startups was, however, far from guaranteed, given that they lack the specialized data that is crucial to businesses in the industries."It feels like an illogical leap to extrapolate Claude Cowork Plugins, or any similar personal productivity tools, to an expectation that every company will hereby write and maintain a bespoke product to replace every layer of mission-critical enterprise software they have ever deployed," said Mark Murphy, Head of U.S. Enterprise Software Research at J.P. Morgan.The S&P 500 software and services index .SPLRCIS slid nearly 13% over five straight sessions and is down 26% from its October peak, whereas the S&P 500 .SPX scaled an all-time high just this week."We are not yet at the point where AI agents will destroy software companies, especially given concerns around security, data ownership and use," said Ben Barringer, head of technology research at Quilter Cheviot."During times of volatility, people often shoot first and ask questions later. As a result, this is not necessarily an isolated incident and further volatility is likely to come."The impact was felt not just across technology companies but also private credit firms that lend heavily to software firms. Blue Owl Capital OWL.N tumbled 9.8% on Tuesday, while Ares Management ARES.N dropped 10.2% and KKR KKR.N fell 9.7%.Nasdaq-listed Thomson Reuters TRI.O, the parent company of Reuters News, was down about 2% after Tuesday's record 16% slump on fears that AI could threaten its core legal...

title: Man arrested after police find cannabis in his car boot in Ma On Shan
content: A man was arrested on Wednesday night after police found cannabis in his car during a patrol in Ma On Shan.Officers from the New Territories South emergency unit spotted the 38-year-old driver opening the bonnet of his parked car on Sai Sha Road near Ma On Shan Town Centre around 8pm. The man attempted to close it upon seeing police, raising suspicion.Officers stopped and searched the vehicle, discovering a batch of cannabis. title: China's Xi agrees to hike U.S. soybeans purchases after Trump call, U.S. says
content: U.S. President Donald Trump said he had a "very positive" call with Chinese President Xi Jinping on Wednesday about trade and security issues even as Beijing warned Washington about arms sales to Taiwan.Two months before Trump is expected to visit Beijing, Xi agreed to hike soybean purchases from the U.S. to 20 million tons in the current season, up from 12 million tons previously, Trump said. Soybean futures rallied sharply after the announcement. The ailing U.S. farm belt is a major domestic political constituency for Trump and China is a major consumer.Along with the goodwill gesture, Xi also warned Trump about Taiwan, a source of ongoing tension between the world's biggest economies."The United States must carefully handle arms sales to Taiwan," Beijing said in an official summary of the meeting.Trump and Xi's call was held hours after Xi's virtual meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin."All very positive," Trump said in a post on his Truth Social platform. "The relationship with China, and my personal relationship with President Xi, is an extremely good one, and we both realize how important it is to keep it that way."Reuters

title: No buyout talks for Kings, DeRozan, sources say
content: If DeMar DeRozan remains with the Sacramento Kings past the trade deadline, they have zero plans to buy him out of his current contract, team sources said. Following a report that mentioned DeRozan as a "strong possibility" to become a buyout candidate in the next month, league sources said there have not been any discussions with DeRozan's side about that path. DeRozan is in the second season of a three-year contract signed in the summer of 2024. He is owed $25.7 million next season, but only $10 million of it is guaranteed. DeRozan, like all of Sacramento's veterans, has been available to a certain degree in the lead-up to the trade deadline, but the Kings haven't been in a rush to move his contract. If he is kept past the deadline, the partial guarantee gives the Kings a chance to explore his trade market or opt to shed a chunk of salary this summer. Veteran teammates, coaches and executives continue to praise DeRozan's professionalism behind the scenes, as he has remained productive and positive despite the regime change and losing environment he didn't initially pledge to join. DeRozan is averaging 19.2 points in 51 games this season. Earlier this month, he became the 23rd player in NBA history to score 26,000 career points.
creator: anthony slater

title: Stardew Valley 1.7 will add two new marriage candidates
content: Later this month, Stardew Valley will turn 10 years-old. Creator ConcernedApe is currently working on the gameโs 1.7 update, and has confirmed that it will add two new marriage candidates for players seeking romance. Eric โConcernedApeโ Barrone was speaking to IGN when he teased some of the new content coming in Stardew Valley 1.7. โI'm going to be adding two more marriage candidates,โ he revealed. ConcernedApe will announce the two new marriage candidates for Stardew on February 26, the gameโs tenth anniversary. ConcernedApe also shared that the 1.7 update will make player children โa little more interesting,โ fulfilling a popular fan request. He said there will be additional things in the 1.7 update that he believes players will appreciate. Stardew Valley currently has 12 characters that players can marry. That number has remained the same since the gameโs 1.1 update, but will finally expand with the release of 1.7. Thereโs no current timetable for Stardew Valley 1.7 , but weโll be sure to let you know when that changes.
