title: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang believes it's 'illogical' that AI would replace software tools
content: The tech craze around artificial intelligence has ballooned to an insane extent coming into 2026, and NVIDIA has been in a position to capitalize greatly by selling the tools many companies are using to pursue their AI ambitions. However, that doesnโt mean CEO Jensen Huang is accepting more ridiculous notions in the space. After the recent release of animation-generating AI models caused software company stocks to dip, Huang has pushed back on the notion that AI could replace software tools and companies altogether. Huang spoke on the matter of software at an artificial intelligence tech conference in San Francisco, as shared by Reuters . There, he claimed that the idea that AI would completely replace software tools was nonsense: The recent stock selloff in software companies was spurred by the release of Google's new AI tool, Project Genie , which is reportedly able to generate imagined explorable worlds. Project Genieโs release sent investors into a tizzy over whether or not such a thing could replace the likes of Nintendo and PlayStation game development. Many companies, including Grand Theft Auto 6 parent company Take-Two Interactive, were affected. Huang doesnโt seem to buy into the idea that games like Super Mario Bros, Zelda, and Grand Theft Auto are in any danger of going away. As we continue to follow for updates, stay tuned to the AI topic .
creator: tj denzer

title: T20 World Cup warm-up: Namibia overcome Scotland in high-scoring game
content: Namibia registered a thrilling victory over Scotland in a high-scoring warm-up match ahead of the ICC T20 World Cup 2026 at the BCCI's Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru. The win was largely due to an explosive 137-run partnership between openers Jan Frylinck and Louren Steenkamp, who took just 71 balls to do so. Their stellar performance helped Namibia post a formidable total of 226 runs for four wickets. In response, Scotland managed 220/5 in 20 overs. Scotland, in reply to Namibia's mammoth total, was led by Brandon McMullen who scored a blistering 95 off just 39 balls. Besides his 95, the likes of Richie Berrington (46) and Mark Watt (33) also chipped in. Scotland got close to the target but Namibia's bowlers stepped up at the last moment, restricting them to 220 runs for five wickets. The match went down to the wire with Scotland needing 12 runs off the final over. Namibia's JJ Smit was the star performer in the final over, bowling Scotland captain Berrington on the second ball and conceding just five runs. Despite a cameo from former New Zealand international Tom Bruce (20 off 14 balls), Scotland fell short of their target. This thrilling encounter not only showcased Namibia's batting prowess but also highlighted their bowling strength under pressure. Earlier, Scotland replaced Bangladesh in the ICC T20 World Cup 2026. The decision came after the Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) refused to change its stance on participating in India, despite being given time by the International Cricket Council (ICC). With Bangladesh's exit, Scotland will be part of Group C in the tournament's preliminary stage.
creator: rajdeep saha

title: Snack time? Try these Spanish almond delights
content: Spanish cuisine is famous for its variety of flavors and textures, and almond-based snacks are no exception. These crunchy delights are a staple in Spanish households, offering a unique combination of taste and nutrition. From traditional recipes to modern twists, almond snacks in Spain offer something for everyone. Here are some popular almond snacks that highlight the versatility and richness of this nut in Spanish culinary traditions. Marcona almonds are often referred to as the Queen of Almonds. Native to Spain, these almonds are rounder and softer than regular ones. They are usually lightly fried in olive oil and sprinkled with sea salt, making them a delicious snack on their own or as part of a tapas spread. Their sweet flavor and buttery texture make them a favorite among locals and tourists alike. Turron is a traditional Spanish nougat made with almonds, honey, sugar, and egg whites. It is usually available in two varieties: turron de Alicante (hard) and turron de Jijona (soft). This festive treat is especially popular during Christmas but can be enjoyed year-round. The combination of crunchy almonds with sweet honey makes it an irresistible dessert option for many. Almond cake or torta de almendra is a popular dessert across Spain. Made with ground almonds, sugar, and lemon zest or orange zest for flavor, this cake is moist yet dense. It can be served plain or topped with powdered sugar for added sweetness. This cake highlights how versatile almonds can be when incorporated into baked goods. Almond ice cream or helado de almendra is another delightful way to enjoy the nutty flavor of almonds on warm days in Spain. Prepared by blending milk or cream with ground almonds, sugar, and vanilla extract, this creamy dessert is a favorite among those who love nut-flavored ice creams. It offers a refreshing alternative to traditional vanilla or chocolate ice creams.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: Why should you dance barefoot?
content: Dancing barefoot at home can be a liberating experience. It connects you more with your body, and gives you the freedom to express yourself without the constraints of footwear. Be it a casual groove to your favorite tune or an intense dance workout, going barefoot can enhance your experience in more ways than one. Here are five unexpected perks of dancing barefoot at home. Dancing barefoot helps improve balance and coordination by engaging the small muscles in your feet. Without shoes, you get better sensory feedback from the ground, which helps you adjust your posture and movements more effectively. This increased awareness can translate into better stability in everyday activities. Dancing without shoes strengthens the muscles in your feet and arches. The natural movement encourages flexibility and endurance, reducing the risk of injuries over time. Stronger foot muscles contribute to better overall support for your body, especially during high-impact activities. Dancing without shoes allows for greater freedom of movement. It reduces restrictions that may come from footwear design or fit issues. This freedom enables more fluidity in dance styles that require quick changes in direction or rapid footwork, enhancing performance quality. Dancing barefoot heightens sensory awareness as it allows direct contact with different surfaces. This connection enhances proprioceptionโthe body's ability to sense movement and positionโwhich is crucial for executing precise dance techniques. Increased sensory awareness also fosters creativity by encouraging spontaneous expression through movement. Dancing barefoot at home is a cost-effective way to stay active without investing in expensive equipment or classes. It offers an accessible form of exercise that can easily fit into any schedule or space constraints. This makes it an ideal option for those looking to maintain fitness levels on a budget.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: Writing thank-you notes? Follow these etiquette tips
content: Writing thank-you notes is a simple yet powerful way to express gratitude and maintain relationships. Whether it's for a gift, a favor, or an act of kindness, a well-crafted note can leave a lasting impression. While the digital age has made communication easier, the art of penning down heartfelt thank-you notes remains timeless. Here are five etiquette tips to help you write thank-you notes that resonate with sincerity and appreciation. Timeliness is key when it comes to writing thank-you notes. Ideally, you should send your note within two weeks of receiving a gift or favor. This shows that you value the gesture and are prompt in acknowledging it. Delaying too long may make the recipient feel undervalued or forgotten, so try to keep this timeframe in mind while drafting your message. A personalized note goes a long way in making the recipient feel special. Mention specific details about the gift or action you are thankful for, and explain how it has impacted you positively. This personal touch not only makes your gratitude more genuine but also strengthens your bond with the person receiving it. Proper formatting is essential for making your thank-you note look professional and easy to read. Start with a polite greeting, followed by an expression of gratitude, and then move on to the main body where you elaborate on why you are thankful. End with a warm closing statement before signing off with your name. This structure makes sure that your message is clear and well-organized. The choice of stationery can also affect how your note is received. Choose simple but elegant cards that suit the occasion and relationship with the recipient. Avoid overly casual or flashy designs unless they are appropriate for the context of your gratitude expression. Before sending out any thank-you note, make sure you proofread it for spelling and grammatical errors. Mistakes in such notes can divert attention from your heartfelt message, making it look less sincere or careless. A careful review guarantees that your note is polished and conveys the right tone of appreciation, making it all the more meaningful for the recipient.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: Why stainless steel tongs are a versatile kitchen tool
content: Stainless steel tongs are a versatile tool in any kitchen. They provide a firm grip and are resistant to heat, making them ideal for a range of cooking tasks. From flipping vegetables to serving salads, these tongs make cooking and serving easier. Here are five practical ways to use stainless steel tongs in your daily kitchen routine, highlighting their multifunctional nature. Stainless steel tongs are perfect for flipping vegetables while sauteing or grilling. Their sturdy design ensures that you can turn vegetables without crushing them, giving you perfectly cooked pieces every time. The heat resistance of stainless steel means they won't warp or melt, even when used on high heat. This makes them an indispensable tool for any vegetable-based dish. When it comes to serving salads, stainless steel tongs are a must-have. Their long reach makes it easy to pick up and serve portions without making a mess. The non-slip grip of the tongs ensures that you can pick up both leafy greens and heavier ingredients like beans or nuts with equal ease. Grilling becomes a breeze with stainless steel tongs by your side. Their ability to handle high temperatures makes them perfect for outdoor grilling sessions. Be it flipping burgers or arranging skewers on the grill, these tongs provide the control and precision required for perfect grilling results. Tossing pasta dishes is a cinch with stainless steel tongs, as they can easily mix ingredients without damaging delicate pasta shapes. The strong grip helps combine sauces evenly throughout the dish, ensuring every bite is flavorful. Plus, their durability means they won't bend under pressure when mixing heavy ingredients. In baking, stainless steel tongs come in handy for tasks like lifting hot trays from ovens or separating pieces of dough on baking sheets. Their precision grip helps you handle delicate tasks like arranging cookies or pastries without leaving fingerprints on surfaces. This keeps your baked goods looking professional.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: Add traditional craftsmanship with these woven wall art pieces
content: Woven wall art is a beautiful way to add a touch of traditional Indian craftsmanship to your home. These intricate pieces are made using age-old techniques, giving each piece a unique charm. They add texture and warmth to any room, making them an ideal choice for those who appreciate cultural artistry. Here are five woven wall art pieces that can bring an authentic Indian vibe to your home. Rajasthani tapestries are famous for their vibrant colors and detailed patterns. Usually made from cotton or silk, these tapestries are embellished with mirror work and embroidery. They can be used as wall hangings or even as bedspreads, adding a pop of color and texture to your space. The intricate designs often depict traditional motifs, giving you a glimpse into Rajasthan's rich cultural heritage. Dhurries are flat-woven rugs that have been used in Indian homes for centuries. As wall hangings, they offer a simple yet elegant look with their geometric patterns and earthy tones. Made from wool or cotton, dhurries are durable and easy to maintain. They lend a rustic charm to any room while showcasing the versatility of Indian weaving techniques. Kantha embroidery is a traditional craft from West Bengal that involves stitching together layers of fabric with running stitches to create beautiful patterns. As wall panels, these pieces add depth and character to your walls with their intricate designs and vibrant colors. Kantha panels can be used as statement pieces or combined with other artworks for an eclectic look. Kutch mirror work art is famous for its reflective embellishments set in colorful fabrics. This type of woven art is typically produced in Gujarat and is characterized by its vibrant colors and intricate designs. The reflective mirrors add an element of sparkle, making it a perfect choice for those who want to add some glamour to their interiors. Pattachitra is an ancient art form from Odisha, known for its intricate details and mythological themes. Inspired by this art form, woven pieces often depict similar motifs on textiles like cotton or silk blends. These weavings make for stunning wall decorations that celebrate India's rich storytelling traditions through visual artistry.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: Arbitrage mutual funds v/s direct equity: Which is less risky?
content: Investors often find themselves at a crossroads when choosing between arbitrage mutual funds and direct equity investments. While both options have their own advantages, understanding the risk dynamics can help in making informed decisions. Here's a look at the risk profiles of arbitrage mutual funds and direct equity investments, giving you insights into their volatility, return potential, and market exposure. Arbitrage mutual funds capitalize on price differences between markets. They buy securities in one market and sell them in another at a higher price. These funds invest mainly in equities but keep a large part of the portfolio in debt instruments to reduce risk. Since they are based on market inefficiencies, they are less volatile than direct equity investments. Direct equity investments mean buying shares of companies directly from stock exchanges. This method offers higher returns but comes with greater risks owing to market volatility. The performance of direct equity is directly tied to company performance and market conditions, making it more unpredictable than arbitrage mutual funds. While arbitrage mutual funds are less risky than direct equity investments, they are not risk-free. The returns are usually lower than direct equity due to their conservative approach. Market conditions can also affect their performance, but they are generally more stable than direct equity. Direct equity investments are prone to high volatility owing to factors like economic changes, company performance, and investor sentiment. The potential for high returns comes with the risk of significant losses if the market turns against you. Investors need to keep a close watch on market trends and be ready for sudden price changes. While arbitrage mutual funds provide stable but lower returns, direct equity investments offer higher return potential. The latter is subject to market conditions and company performance. While arbitrage mutual funds are a safer bet with stable returns, direct equity can be rewarding for those willing to take on higher risks for the chance of bigger gains.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: If Argentina is on your mind, continue reading
content: Argentina is known for its rich culture in certain areas, but not all regions are worth your time. While some areas are famous for their exquisite products, others may not live up to the hype. Knowing which regions to skip can save you time and money on your tour. Here are some overrated Argentine regions that may not be worth the visit. Mendoza is Argentina's most famous region for its vineyards, but some of its touristy spots can be very crowded and expensive. While Mendoza is home to some of the best vineyards, the more popular ones tend to have long waiting lines and inflated prices. Going to lesser-known areas in Mendoza or visiting during off-peak seasons can give you a better experience without the crowds. San Juan is often overshadowed by its more famous neighbor, Mendoza. Although it does produce some decent products, it lacks the diversity and quality that Mendoza offers. The region mainly focuses on bulk production rather than premium items. If you're looking for unique tasting experiences or high-quality varietals, you might be disappointed with what San Juan has to offer. Patagonia has gained a lot of attention for its cool climate varieties, but visiting here can be pretty expensive. The cost of traveling in this remote area is high, and the accommodation options are limited and costly. While you may find some interesting varieties here, the high costs may not justify a trip unless you're specifically interested in Patagonian varieties. While La Rioja has a rich history of winemaking, the quality of its products can be inconsistent. The region has been focusing on improving its product quality over the years, but many of its offerings still fall short of international standards. If you're looking for reliable quality, you might want to skip this region until it establishes a more consistent reputation.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: WPL 2026, DC vs RCB: Preview of final
content: The 2026 Women's Premier League (WPL) final will see Delhi Capitals and Royal Challengers Bangalore clash in a highly anticipated showdown. The summit clash will take place at BCA Stadium in Kotambi, Vadodara, on February 5. While the Smriti Mandhana-led RCB eye their second title, DC will have another shot at the trophy after finishing as the runners-up in the last three seasons. The Kotambi Stadium pitch has been balanced throughout the series, with an average first-innings score of around 160 runs. Dew could play a major role in the match, making it difficult for bowlers in the second innings. The match will be broadcast live on the Star Sports Network and the JioHotstar (app and website) at 7:30pm IST. DC, led by Jemimah Rodrigues, are high on confidence with a stunning win over Gujarat Giants in the Eliminator. According to ESPNcricinfo, the Capitals have used only 13 players this year, the fewest for a side across four WPL seasons. Likely XI: Shafali Verma, Lizelle Lee (wicket-keeper), Laura Wolvaardt, Jemimah Rodrigues (captain), Marizanne Kapp, Chinelle Henry, Niki Prasad, Sneh Rana, Minnu Mani, Nandni Sharma, and Shree Charani. RCB's journey to the final has also been impressive, especially without Ellyse Perry. They replaced her with uncapped Indian fast bowler Sayali Satghare, who has become a key part of their seam attack. RCB, the first team to reach the playoffs this season, won six of their eight matches. Likely XI: Grace Harris, Smriti Mandhana (captain), Georgia Voll, Radha Yadav, Richa Ghosh (wicket-keeper), Nadine de Klerk, Pooja Vastrakar, Arundhati Reddy, Sayali Satghare, Shreyanka Patil, and Lauren Bell. DC's Nandni Sharma is the second-highest wicket-taker this season with 16 scalps. She already has the most wickets for an Indian in a WPL season. Mandhana could finish as the highest run-scorer this season. With 290 runs, she is only behind Mumbai Indians' Harmanpreet Kaur (342) and Nat Sciver-Brunt (321). As mentioned, DC reached their fourth WPL final. They were the runners-up in the first three editions (2023-2025).
creator: parth dhall

title: #TechBytes: How to silence background noise on phone calls
content: In today's world, where background noise can be a major distraction during phone calls, knowing how to silence it can make a world of difference. Be it a busy cafe or a crowded street, having clear communication is important. Here are some practical tips to help you reduce background noise on phone calls without investing in expensive equipment or software. These simple strategies can improve your call quality and make conversations more pleasant. Investing in noise-canceling headphones can be a game-changer for phone calls. These headphones use advanced technology to block out external sounds, letting you focus on the conversation. They are especially useful in loud environments, as they filter out ambient noise and make your voice clearer to the other person. Plus, many models come with built-in microphones that further improve sound quality. Selecting an appropriate location for your phone call can drastically reduce background noise. If possible, try to find a quiet room or a less crowded space where you can talk without interruptions. If you're outdoors, look for sheltered areas away from traffic or construction sounds. This way, you can ensure better audio clarity and fewer distractions during your conversation. Muting your microphone when you're not speaking is a simple yet effective way to minimize background noise during group calls or conferences. This prevents ambient sounds from being transmitted to other participants and keeps the focus on the speakers at any given time. Most smartphones and computers have easy-to-use mute functions that can be quickly accessed when needed. Several apps come with built-in noise suppression features that can help improve call quality by reducing unwanted sounds. These apps use algorithms to filter out background noises while amplifying human voices, making conversations clearer even in noisy environments. Look for apps specifically designed for communication purposes with strong reviews on their noise-canceling capabilities. Adjusting your device's microphone settings can also help in reducing background noise during calls. Most smartphones have options to enhance voice clarity by reducing ambient sounds. Check your device settings under sound or accessibility options, and experiment with different configurations until you find one that works best for your needs.
creator: pallabi chatterjee

title: India-US trade deal: Kharge targets Centre; Goyal calls decision `landmark step`
content: Leader of Opposition in the Rajya Sabha and Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge on Wednesday launched a sharp attack on the India-US trade deal while commerce and industry Minister Piyush Goyal described the agreement as a landmark step in strengthening India-US relations and advancing the vision of Viksit Bharat 2047.He said both sides would now complete technical processes and paperwork.โI wish to reiterate to this august House that India`s core sensitivities in food and agriculture have been fully safeguarded,โ Goyal said.Kharge with contrasting views alleged that it would harm Indian farmers and weaken the countryโs agriculture sector. Speaking during the Motion of Thanks to the Presidentโs Address in the Upper House, Kharge accused the government of sidelining Parliament and prioritising foreign interests over farmers.Insult to ParliamentKharge said Parliament learned about the trade deal from US President Donald Trump while the House was in session. โThe fact that parliamentarians came to know about the India-US trade deal from President Trump and not the government is an insult to Parliament,โ he said, adding that Trump appeared to be โtelling what India should do and how to run it from the US.โQuoting US Agriculture Secretary Brooke Rollins, Kharge said, โThe new US-India deal will export farm products to India`s massive markets, lifting prices and pumping cash into rural America.โ โMeaning American farmers will benefit,โ he said, asking the government, โTell us, are you (government) working for the welfare of farmers, or are you against the farmers?โ according to PTI.Zero-Tariff Imports a ThreatKharge alleged that American farm imports would enter India at zero tariff, while Indian exports would face an 18 percent duty. โIndian farmers will be destroyed by this deal,โ he said, accusing the government of wanting to โdestroyโ the agriculture sector. He also criticised the government for what he called a pattern of ignoring farmersโ concerns over the past 11 years the government had โbulldozedโ social justice, equality and parliamentary democracy.He alleged the weakening of the Constitutionโs four pillarsโjustice, liberty, equality and fraternityโand said atrocities against minorities, tribals and women had increased under NDA rule.Manipur, Minorities and Silenced ParliamentKharge said any talk of social harmony must include Manipur, where at least 200 people have died and 70,000 displaced. โYou have made Manipur a militarised zone,โ he said,...
creator: mid-day

title: Two injured after gas-filled bundle of balloons exploded inside lift in Mumbai
content: Two people were injured after a gas-filled bundle of balloons exploded inside a lift of a building in Mumbai`s Goregaon, officials said on Wednesday, adding the the police has launched a probe into the matter.According to the police, the incident took place on February 2, 2026, at around 10:30 pm."Two people sustained serious burn injuries after a bunch of air-filled balloons exploded inside a lift at a residential building in Goregaon West," a police said.The injured have been identified as Himani Gagan Tapariya (21), a student from Surat in Gujarat and Raju Kumar Mahto (25), a resident of Andheri West.Police said that Tapariya suffered burns to her right hand, neck and abdomen, while Mahto sustained burns to his face.What happenedTapariya had travelled to Mumbai for an admission interview and was heading to her auntโs residence on the 10th floor of Anmol Tower. She entered the lift when Mahto and his associates also boarded, carrying 10 to 12 air-filled balloons.Mahto reportedly works for an event management company that supplies balloons and decorations for parties. As the lift ascended, the balloons suddenly exploded, causing panic and severe injuries to both occupants.A 21-year-old woman was seriously injured after air-filled balloons exploded inside a lift in Goregaon West, Mumbai, on February 2 around 10.30 pm. The woman, Himani Gagan Tapariya from Surat, had entered the lift at Anmol Tower when an unidentified man carrying 10โ12 balloons... pic.twitter.com/9RhEKHy8NMโ Mid Day (@mid_day) February 4, 2026Police said the balloons were allegedly ordered by Arpit Jain, a resident of Room No. 1003, Anmol Tower.A preliminary inquiry revealed that Mahto was not provided with any safety equipment while handling the balloons.A police officer said the incident appears to have been caused by negligence and careless conduct on the part of the employer.Cops begin probeBased on Tapariyaโs statement, the Goregaon Police registered a case under relevant sections of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS). The employer, Tripurari Kumar Jaisawal, has been booked in connection with the incident.Both injured individuals were rushed to separate hospitals and are currently undergoing treatment and an investigation was underway, police said.
creator: mid-day

title: Team India`s wicketkeeper-batsman Rishabh Pant provides an update on his fitness
content: Team India`s wicketkeeper-batsman Rishabh Pant said that he is recovering well from his injury and is also hopeful of making a return to competitive cricket.Speaking on the sidelines of the World Pickleball League, where he was present in his capacity as co-owner of Mumbai Pickle Power, the left-handed batsman said he has been working hard at the BCCI Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru."My fitness is getting better day by day. I am working hard at the Centre of Excellence and I think I`m going to be out (on the field) soon," he said.The cricketer then said that his love for the sport always helped him during the recovery phase."When I am injured, one thing that always keeps me close to the game is the love for the game and the support from the people around you," said Rishabh Pant."As a cricketer, you always have to keep adding to your game. I need to keep looking to get better in each and every aspect of my overall gameplay," he added.The 28-year-old cricketer also said that comebacks have taught him to be more thankful and see things from a different perspective."Every comeback has taught me something about life. It has taught me more gratitude, how you see things around you, and wanting to be committed to something that really makes you happy. When I am injured, the thing I miss the most is really enjoying the game. You love the game so much, but you also enjoy it while playing it at the top level. That`s something I miss truly," concluded the Roorkee-born cricketer.The "Men in Blue" will engage in the T20 World Cup 2026, which will be co-hosted by India and Sri Lanka. The tournament is set to kick off from February 7.Ahead of the marquee event, Team India is placed in Group A along with teams such as Namibia, the Netherlands, Pakistan, and the United States of America (USA).Suryakumar Yadav-led men will begin their global showpiece tournament on February 7 by playing a clash against the USA at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.India`s squad for the T20 World Cup 2026Suryakumar Yadav (C), Sanju Samson (WK), Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Jasprit Bumrah, Ishan Kishan (WK), Rinku Singh, Washington Sundar, Shivam Dube, Abhishek Sharma, Varun Chakaravarthy, Arshdeep Singh, Tilak Varma, Harshit Rana.(With PTI Inputs)

UPSC CSE 2026: Notifications out at upsc.gov.in for 933 vacancies
content: The Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) has officially released the Civil Services Examination (CSE) 2026 notification. This year commission has announced a total of 933 vacancies across various prestigious civil services of the Government of India. Those candidates aspiring to join services such as the Indian Administrative Service (IAS), Indian Police Service (IPS), Indian Foreign Service (IFS), and other Group A and Group B services can now apply online through the official UPSC website. Vacancy Details Add Zee News as a Preferred Source A total of 933 posts will be filled through the UPSC Civil Services Examination 2026. These include vacancies in: Indian Administrative Service (IAS) Indian Police Service (IPS) Indian Foreign Service (IFS) Indian Revenue Service (IRS) Other Central Civil Services (Group A and B) Out of the total vacancies, a specified number of posts are reserved for candidates belonging to PwBD (Persons with Benchmark Disabilities) categories, as per government norms. Eligibility Criteria for UPSC CSE 2026 Educational Qualification: Candidates must possess a Bachelorโs degree from a recognized university. Candidates appearing in the final year of their degree examination are also eligible to apply. Age Limit: Applicants must be between 21 and 32 years as of August 1, 2026. Age relaxation is applicable for candidates belonging to SC, ST, OBC, EWS, and PwBD categories as per UPSC rules. Selection Process The UPSC Civil Services Examination is conducted in three stages: Preliminary Examination โ Objective type (qualifying in nature) Main Examination โ Descriptive written examination Personality Test (Interview) Only those candidates who qualify the Preliminary Examination will be eligible to appear for the Main Examination, followed by the interview stage. How to Apply for UPSC CSE 2026 Visit the UPSC online portal and log in. Complete One Time Registration (OTR) if not done earlier. Select Civil Services (Preliminary) Examination 2026. Fill in personal, educational, and exam centre details. Upload photograph, signature, and photo ID. Pay the application fee (โน100; exempted for women, SC/ST, PwBD). Review the form and submit online. Download and save the application form for reference.

title: 'Agriculture, Dairy Protected': Piyush Goyal Cheers India-US Pact; Jaishankar Meets Trump Top Aides
content: Amid roaring protests in the Lok Sabha, Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal mounts a fierce defence of the India-US trade deal, insisting farmers and dairy interests are fully protected, a day after Rahul Gandhi accused PM Modi of buckling under US pressure. Even as politics erupts at home, diplomacy heats up abroad with EAM S Jaishankar meeting top Trump aides in Washington to reset ties. Meanwhile, high drama grips the Supreme Court as Mamata Banerjee personally takes on the Election Commission, alleging selective targeting of poll-bound Bengal and declaring that โjustice is crying behind closed doors.

title: Bill Gates Responds To Epstein Claims, Denies Wrongdoings As Newly Released Emails Spark Shock
content: Bill Gates has finally responded after newly released Epstein files reignited global controversy. In a rare interview, the Microsoft co-founder denied explosive allegations contained in Jeffrey Epstein's emails released by the U.S. Department of Justice, calling the claims 'false' and stressing that he never visited Epstein's private island or engaged in criminal behaviour.

content: WASHINGTON - Spojeneฬ sฬtaฬty suฬ pripraveneฬ stretnuฬtฬ sa s Iraฬnom tento tyฬzฬdenฬ, ale diskusie sa musia tyฬkatฬ jeho raketovyฬch a jadrovyฬch programov, uviedol v stredu minister zahranicฬnyฬch veciฬ USA Marco Rubio. title: Humanitarian Access Collapses as Yemenโs Political and Security Crisis Deepens
content: UNITED NATIONS, February 4 (IPS) - In recent weeks, Yemenโs humanitarian crisis has sharply worsened, as escalating food insecurity and brutal clashes between armed actors have prompted United Nations (UN) officials to warn that the country is approaching a critical breaking point. Intensified violence has increasingly obstructed lifesaving humanitarian operations, while deepening economic and political instability continues to erode access to essential services. As a result, millions of Yemenis now face the growing risk of being left without the support they need to survive, with children being the hardest-hit. Late December and early January proved to be a particularly volatile period for Yemen, with political turmoil acting as a key driver of instability, particularly in the nationโs south. Recently, the United Arab Emirates (UAE)-backed Southern Transitional Council (STC) launched major offensives across the south, seizing key provinces such as Hadramawt and al-Mahrah, prompting Saudi-backed government forces to launch a series of airstrikes to reclaim key infrastructure in cities such as Mukalla and Aden. While a military de-escalation was achieved in the following days, humanitarian experts warn that the overall security situation remains extremely fragile without a durable political and economic solutionโboth of which continue to threaten national stability. According to UN experts , years of political turmoil have severely weakened the economy, driving inflation, pushing food and fuel prices further out of reach, and leaving large numbers of public sector workers with unpaid salaries. On January 14, UN Special Envoy for Yemen Hans Grundberg briefed ambassadors on the urgent need to establish a credible, transparent, and inclusive political process. He explained that the โdevelopments in southern Yemen highlight how quickly that fragile balance can be disrupted,โ and how critical it is โto re-anchor the process in a credible political pathwayโ. โAbsent a comprehensive approach that addresses Yemenโs many challenges in an integrated manner, rather than in isolation, the risk of recurrent and destabilizing cycles will remain a persistent feature in the countryโs trajectory,โ said Grundberg. Grundberg also underscored the importance of protecting Yemenโs economic institutionsโparticularly the Central Bankโfrom political and security conflicts, warning that even short-lived instability can trigger currency depreciation, expand fiscal deficits, and...

title: Kiefer Sherwood to make Sharks debut, will have big role to start
content: DENVER โ Kiefer Sherwood will make his San Jose Sharks debut on Wednesday when they play the NHL-leading Colorado Avalanche in the last game for both teams before the Olympic break.Related ArticlesVeteran forward takes big step toward making San Jose Sharks debutIs pressure of being in playoff race starting to affect the San Jose Sharks?Slow start, miscues doom Sharks as losing streak reaches three gamesSharks forward carries chip on shoulder after unceremonious Blackhawks exitSharksโ comparison with Blackhawks more than just Celebrini vs. BedardSherwood, who has been on injured reserve with an upper body issue, was a full participant in the Sharksโ 45-minute practice in Chicago on Tuesday as he skated on the teamโs top line alongside Macklin Celebrini and Will Smith. Sherwood will stay on that line for Wednesdayโs game as the Sharks look to snap a three-game losing streak.โThose guys are world-class players. Their magic speaks for itself,โ Sherwood said Tuesday of playing with Celebrini and Smith.โIโll try to play to their strengths, win some pucks back, create some space for them, and just get them the puck.โThe Sharks also created a spot on their 23-man roster for Sherwood on Tuesday afternoon by placing forward Ryan Reaves on injured reserve. Reaves is considered day-to-day with an upper-body ailment.Sherwood, with 17 goals in 44 games this season, figures be a valuable addition to a Sharks team that entered Wednesday three points back of the Seattle Kraken for the Western Conferenceโs second and final wild card spot.โIโve been itching for a long time once I found out about the trade,โ Sherwood said after Tuesdayโs practice. โSo Iโm just excited to get to know the guys, play with them, and build something special here.โPlease check back for updates to this story.

title: Iฬran ABD uฬslerinin fotogฬraflarฤฑnฤฑ paylasฬงtฤฑ
content: Iฬran ile ABD arasฤฑnda bu hafta yapฤฑlmasฤฑ planlanan muฬzakere goฬruฬsฬงmeleri konusฬงulurken, sahadaki askeri gerilim de artฤฑyor. ABDโnin Iฬranโa ait bir insansฤฑz hava aracฤฑnฤฑ vurmasฤฑnฤฑn ardฤฑndan, Tahranโdan dikkat cฬงekici bir hamle geldi. Iฬranโฤฑn yarฤฑ resmi haber ajansฤฑ Fars, herhangi bir resmi acฬงฤฑklama yapmadan, boฬlgede ABD guฬcฬงlerinin konusฬงlu oldugฬu askeri uฬslerin uydu goฬruฬntuฬlerini paylasฬงtฤฑ. Goฬrsellerin iki guฬn uฬst uฬste yayฤฑmlanmasฤฑ, diplomatik cฬงevrelerde bilincฬงli bir mesaj olarak degฬerlendirildi. EL-DHAFRA VE IฬSA HAVA UฬSSUฬ GOฬRUฬNTUฬLENDIฬ Paylasฬงฤฑlan goฬruฬntuฬlerde, Birlesฬงik Arap Emirlikleriโnde bulunan ve ABD ile Fransa tarafฤฑndan kullanฤฑlan El-Dhafra Hava Uฬssuฬ ile Bahreynโdeki Iฬsa Hava Uฬssuฬ yer aldฤฑ. Goฬruฬntuฬlerde stratejik noktalarฤฑn isฬงaretlenmisฬง olmasฤฑ dikkat cฬงekti. Askeri uzmanlara goฬre bu paylasฬงฤฑmlar, ABDโye yoฬnelik acฬงฤฑk bir โgoฬzdagฬฤฑโ niteligฬi tasฬงฤฑyor. TRUMPโIN ACฬงIKLAMALARI SONRASI GELDIฬ Soฬz konusu yayฤฑnlar, ABD Basฬงkanฤฑ Donald Trumpโฤฑn , Iฬranโฤฑn yeni bir nuฬkleer anlasฬงma icฬงin masaya oturmamasฤฑ halinde askeri secฬงeneklerin guฬndeme gelebilecegฬi yoฬnuฬndeki sert acฬงฤฑklamalarฤฑnฤฑn ardฤฑndan geldi. Iฬranlฤฑ yetkililer ise olasฤฑ bir saldฤฑrฤฑ durumunda, Basra Koฬrfeziโndeki ABD uฬslerinin tamamฤฑnฤฑn hedef alฤฑnacagฬฤฑnฤฑ daha oฬnce defalarca dile getirmisฬงti.

Sharon McMahon, โAmericaโs government teacher,โ remains rooted in Duluth
content: DULUTH โ In case you doubted Sharon McMahonโs Twin Ports bona fides, she made clear when discussing her place of residence that she knows exactly what it means to live here.โThis is a unique place,โ McMahon said. โI would challenge you to find anything even remotely similar to it thatโs this far away from a Trader Joeโs, and has this extreme of a climate, and has this kind of arts scene and these kinds of community resources.โNo, the Duluth area does not have a Trader Joeโs, but it does have โAmericaโs government teacher.โ With 1.3 million followers on Instagram, McMahon may be the most famous person currently living full-time in the Northland. (Even Bob Dylan, who once called Central Hillside home, has only 1.2 million Instagram followers.)Thatโs a funny position to be in for a person who remembers how starstruck Duluth was when the movie โIron Willโ was filmed here in 1993. โIt was a big deal,โ McMahon said, โthe idea that someone whoโs on a poster might be walking around your town.โNever mind movie screens, though. People today have their eyes glued to smartphone screens, and McMahon is on a lot of them.From her home outside Duluth, McMahon runs a media enterprise with employees โall over the country, from New York to Los Angeles.โ In addition to social media, she has a digital magazine, a podcast, a book club and more โ including her own book, โThe Small and the Mightyโ (2024), which topped the New York Times hardcover nonfiction bestseller list.โI have zero interest in moving away,โ McMahon said. โEven though itโs very cold and itโs very remote, I love it. Yes, it would be easier to live somewhere else, but I donโt consider it.โNot only has McMahon come a long way since her youthful years plying a News Tribune delivery route while listening to her Walkman, sheโs come a long way in just the past six years. Her rise to fame began in 2020, when she found success with a video about the Electoral College and learned she had a knack for creating accessible civics content online.โWhen I was a child, the internet didnโt exist, so it wasnโt something I could ever have dreamed to have aspired to,โ said McMahon about her online stardom.After growing up in Duluth, McMahon moved away and began a career that included teaching government classes at the high school level.โI moved back to Duluth in 2010 because I had three kids and I wanted to be closer to my family,โ McMahon said. โIt is very interesting to have lived on both coasts and to come back to Duluth as an...

title: Le Pari sur Mesure de TrashTalk : les Rockets de KD et Sengun dominent les Celtics
content: Le 04 feฬvr. 2026 aฬ 18:22 par Nicolas Meichel Amis parieurs, amies parieuses, lโheure est venue de se mouiller. La saison NBA 2025-26 est aฬ sa moitieฬ et on garde donc les bonnes habitudes avec 7 matchs au programme ce mercredi. De quoi profiter de nombreuses cotes potentiellement inteฬressantes aฬ jouer. Aujourdโhui, on vous propose un ยซ Pari sur Mesure ยป, avec une combinaison de cotes reฬaliseฬe par nos soins. Comme chaque anneฬe, nous vous proposerons โ tout au long de la saison โ quelques conseils pour guider les plus joueurs dโentre vous, en espeฬrant que cela vous sera utile. Lโobjectif est clair : faire peฬter la banque de notre partenaire ParionsSport en Ligne ! Mais nโoubliez jamais de jouer de manieฬre responsable, cโest-aฬ-dire en misant uniquement de lโargent que vous pouvez vous permettre de perdre . Hashtag faites pas les boloss, vous connaissez. Le ยซ Pari sur Mesure ยป, cโest quoi ? Cโest un dispositif proposeฬ par notre partenaire ParionsSport en Ligne . Il permet de combiner plusieurs paris (entre 2 et 10) sur un meฬme match NBA, ce qui vous donne la possibiliteฬ de creฬer et personnaliser votre propre cote. Vous pouvez deฬsigner aฬ la fois le vainqueur du match, le nombre de points marqueฬs par joueur, le nombre de points dans le match etc. Les Rockets battent les Celtics (temps reฬglementaire) + Kevin Durant marque minimum 23 points + Alperen Sengun deฬlivre au moins 4 passes ( 2,52 ) : les Celtics sont en back-to-back apreฬs un gros match aฬ Dallas hier, ils risquent donc de souffrir un peu physiquement, surtout face aux Rockets. Houston reste sur huit victoires en dix matchs et devrait pouvoir sโappuyer sur son duo Kevin Durant โ Alperen Sengun pour garder sa bonne dynamique. Reฬcemment toucheฬ aฬ la cheville, KD sera normalement en tenue ce soir pour marquer ses 25 points habituels, tandis que le pivot turc est tout simplement lโun des meilleurs inteฬrieurs passeurs de la NBA (6,3 par match). Si les trois conditions exposeฬes ci-dessus sont reฬunies dans ce match, vous gagnerez un pari avec une belle cote de 2,52. Pour creฬer son Pari NBA sur Mesure, il faut : Info aฬ savoir : les paris concernant le match (face aฬ face, + ou โ de points eฬquipe, reฬsultat mi-temps...) sortent 24h avant le deฬbut du match, tandis que les paris concernant les performances joueurs sortent 8h avant le deฬbut du match. Pour plus de preฬcisions, on vous invite aฬ cliquer sur ce lien . Les cotes NBA proposeฬes dans cet article sont susceptibles de monter...

Ravioli filled with red beets is the colorful pasta dish of Olympic host Cortina
content: By ANDREW DAMPFCORTINA DโAMPEZZO, Italy (AP) โ Every corner of Italy has its own culinary traditions, from carbonara in Rome to tortellini in Bologna. Winter Olympics co-host Cortina dโAmpezzoโs signature dish is the colorful, stuffed pasta known as casunziei.Related ArticlesIs it chili? Is it mac and cheese? This slow cooker recipe combines the best of bothWith caviar McNuggets and heart-shaped pizza, fast food chains hope to win Valentineโs dinersSnack like a pro on Super Bowl Sunday with Panko-crusted chicken strips and game-changing sauce3 Super Bowl recipes from esteemed chefsFresh find: Gluten-free waffles or pancakes from a boxThe ravioli-type dish, also known as casunziei allโAmpezzana, consists of homemade half-moon shaped pasta filled with boiled beets, topped with a sauce of melted butter, Parmesan cheese and poppy seeds.Itโs a simple dish that harks back to the Alpine regionโs poorer past โ long before Cortina transformed into a winter playground for the international jet set. Even in the coldest days of winter, local families had the ingredients in their cupboards. Casunziei (pronounced cah-SOON-zi-eh) can also have other fillings replacing beets.โItโs a typical local dish. My favorite casunziei are the ones cooked by my grandmother โ the spinach ones,โ Stefania Constantini, a defending Olympic curling champion in mixed doubles and a Cortina native, told The Associated Press.Casunziei is linked to Cortinaโs Ladin culture that stretches back a millennium. And they can still be sampled at many Cortina establishments โ both in high-end restaurants and more local, rustic spots.Gianluca Belli, a chef at the Michelin-starred Ristorante Tivoli, showed the AP how to make casunziei while Luca Noale, manager of restaurant The Roof, translated and explained the steps.Ingredients (for 2 people, or about 22 pieces):1. 1 2โ3 cups (200 grams) of flour 2. 2 eggs 3. about 3โ4 pound (400 grams) of beets 4. Salt and pepper 5. Half a stick (50 grams) of butter 6. Grated Parmesan 7. Poppy seedsCooking steps1. Start by making the pasta one day before serving. Dump flour onto working surface and form a well in the middle with your fingers. Crack eggs into the center of the well. Use a fork to slowly incorporate the egg into the flour. When it is completely mixed in, start to knead the mixture with your hands until it becomes smooth. Store in the refrigerator overnight.2. The next day, peel and boil the beets until tender (about two hours) then place in a food...

title: Stabbing of former Oakland Raiders player in L.A. may be linked to 3 other homeless encampment slayings
content: The recent stabbing death of former NFL player Kevin Johnson could be linked to the deaths of three other homeless people in same Los Angeles area, police said.Johnson, an L.A. native who played for both the Philadelphia Eagles and Oakland Raiders in the 90s, was found dead on Jan. 21 near a homeless encampment in the 1300 block of E. 120th Street in the unincorporated community of Willowbrook, near Compton. The Los Angeles County Medical Examiner has since said that he died from โblunt head trauma and stab wounds.โIn a press release on Tuesday, the Los Angeles County Sheriffโs Department said Johnsonโs killing was one of four homicides that occurred near the same encampment between October 2025 and January 2026. It further noted that all four victims were believed to be โunhousedโ and living in the area at the time of their deaths.A week after Johnson was found, authorities responded to a spot by a nearby flood channel after a man was found dead there, CBS News reported. No other information has been provided about the other deaths.โAt this time, investigators are working to determine whether these cases are related,โ the sheriffโs office said.Johnson, a defensive lineman, may have been suffering from chronic traumatic encephalopathy, or CTE, a brain disease caused by repeated head injuries, his loved ones told KABC-TV.โHe was my best friend. I was best man at his wedding... Great guy, fun-loving,โ Bruce Todd said. โThe community is going to miss him,โ

title: ยฟQueฬ papel tendraฬ el ICE en el Super Bowl? Jefa de seguridad lo aclara
content: El mayor espectaฬculo deportivo de Estados Unidos llega este domingo al Leviโs Stadium de Santa Clara con un mensaje claro: el Super Bowl se desarrollaraฬ sin operativos migratorios.La jefa de seguridad de la NFL, Cathy Lanier, aseguroฬ que el Servicio de Inmigracioฬn y Control de Aduanas (ICE) no tendraฬ ninguฬn rol en la jornada donde los Patriots y los Seahawks buscaraฬn la corona del fuฬtbol americano.Un rumor que encendioฬ las alarmasEn los uฬltimos diฬas, diversos medios estadounidenses difundieron versiones sobre una supuesta participacioฬn de agentes del ICE dentro y fuera del estadio.Las publicaciones generaron inquietud entre aficionados y organizaciones defensoras de migrantes, que temiฬan redadas durante el evento.Lanier salioฬ al paso de esas informaciones y afirmoฬ de manera categoฬrica que โno existen operaciones planificadas de control migratorioโ relacionadas con el partido ni con las actividades previas.La responsable de la seguridad de la liga explicoฬ que el esquema de proteccioฬn seraฬ parecido al de anฬos anteriores.Equipos de emergencia, policiฬas locales y agencias federales trabajaraฬn coordinados, pero uฬnicamente para prevenir delitos comunes y responder a cualquier incidente, no para realizar detenciones migratorias.Lea tambieฬn: Masa de aire friฬo mantendraฬ ambiente fresco y seco en Honduras este mieฬrcolesUn ambiente sin amenazasLanier subrayoฬ que, hasta el momento, las autoridades no han detectado amenazas especiฬficas ni creiฬbles contra el Super Bowl. โEl puฬblico puede asistir con tranquilidad; nuestro objetivo es que la gente disfrute del juego y del espectaฬculoโ, expresoฬ durante una conferencia de prensa.El tema ha cobrado sensibilidad debido a las recientes acciones del ICE en varias ciudades del paiฬs.El despliegue de agentes fuertemente armados y enmascarados ha provocado protestas, especialmente tras la muerte de dos ciudadanos estadounidenses en Minneapolis durante un operativo el mes pasado.Estos hechos alimentaron el temor de que el evento deportivo pudiera convertirse en escenario de redadas.La NFL intenta bajar la tensioฬnFrente a ese contexto, la liga busca separar el fuฬtbol de la poliฬtica migratoria. Lanier reiteroฬ que la organizacioฬn mantiene comunicacioฬn constante con agencias federales, pero solo para temas de logiฬstica y seguridad general. โEstamos seguros de que no habraฬ actividades del ICE en torno al Super Bowlโ, insistioฬ.Miles de aficionados llegaraฬn desde distintos estados y paiฬses para...

title: Maccabi Tel Aviv tops Partizan at the buzzer, Hapoel continues to slump in Euroleague
content: Maccabi Tel Aviv defeated Partizan Belgrade 95-93 in Euroleague action late Tuesday night at Yad Eliyahu as Jimmy Clark drained the game-winning basket as the clock hit zero to give the yellow-and-blue the victory.With the win, Oded Katash's team improved its Euroleague record to 11-15, and it will play the back end of the double week in Serbia at Red Star Belgrade on Friday.Prior to the game, Maccabi held a very special ceremony honoring Partizan for hosting the club for more than two years after the terrorist attacks by Hamas on October 7, 2023.Dylan Osetkowski and Iffe Lundberg were the principal scorers for their respective squads in the opening quarter, while Clark and Isaac Bonga scored as well, and Maccabi went ahead 27-22. Osetkowski continued to find the basket as Sterling Brown and Bonga added points while Lundberg continued to score for the hosts, but Partizan took a 50-48 lead into halftime.Brown didn't miss as the third quarter began while Roman Sorkin and Clark responded, but Brown and Payne bumped up the Partizan lead to 77-72.Lundberg and Marcio Santos filled the basket, Bruno Fernando scored some key baskets, but Clark nailed the game-winning jumper as time expired to give Maccabi the win.Clark and Lundberg each scored 21 points while Santos added 17 points for Maccabi in the win, while Brown scored 19 points as Osetkowski and Fernando each put in 17 points in the defeat.โI'm very happy for the win, and we found a way,โ Katash said. โWe couldn't have done it without the crowd in a great atmosphere. We weren't aggressive enough, and at halftime I told the guys, it doesn't feel like we wanted to win. Credit to Partizan, and we knew it was going to be a totally different game than last time, but I'm happy for Jimmy, he really deserved it, but we have to learn the lesson.โKatash also spoke about the ceremony held before the contest.โIt was very emotional for me. The way they hosted us made us feel it was our second home; it was very special, and I want to thank everyone in Belgrade; they deserved this ceremony.โโCongratulations to Maccabi for the win and to congratulations to my players, we deserved more,โ Partizan coach Joan Pennaroya began. โIn the last minutes, Maccabi scored the important shots, and we missed those shots.โClark, the game's MVP, spoke about the win.โI had confidence out there thanks to my teammates and the coach; they trusted me with that last shot. They gave me the ball and I just thank God for it. We're trying to build...

PMs que faziam segurancฬงa de dono da Transwolff saฬo presos em Saฬo Paulo
content: Treฬs policiais militares suspeitos de fazer a segurancฬงa do dono da empresa de oฬnibus Transwolff, investigada por elo com o PCC, foram presos em uma operacฬงaฬo da corregedoria da PM de Saฬo Paulo hoje. O que aconteceu Aleฬm das treฬs prisoฬes, foram cumpridos 16 mandados de busca e apreensaฬo na operacฬงaฬo. Os nomes dos policiais alvos da operacฬงaฬo naฬo foram divulgados pela Secretaria de Segurancฬงa Puฬblica de Saฬo Paulo. Pedidos de prisoฬes saฬo resultados da conclusaฬo da Operacฬงaฬo Fim da Linha, de 2024. A investigacฬงaฬo em questaฬo apontou o possiฬvel envolvimento de policiais na segurancฬงa patrimonial e pessoal de empresas investigadas por irregularidades. Veja mais sobre ela abaixo. PMs prestaram servicฬงo a dono da Transwolff em 2020 Servicฬงos de segurancฬงa privada foram prestados por PMs da Rota ao dono da Transwolff em 2020, segundo apuracฬงaฬo do colunista do UOL Josmar Jozino. Um ano antes da contratacฬงaฬo dos servicฬงos, os diretores da viacฬงaฬo jaฬ eram investigados pelo MP-SP (Ministeฬrio Puฬblico do Estado de Saฬo Paulo) por suspeita de organizacฬงaฬo criminosa. Em novembro de 2020, a Transwolff emitiu nota fiscal para uma empresa de segurancฬงa ligada a um entaฬo capitaฬo da Rota. Nota para a companhia, sediada em Santana, zona norte da capital, tinha o valor de R$ 20.006,70 pelos servicฬงos prestados aฬ diretoria da companhia de oฬnibus. O MP-SP apurou que um sargento da Rota recebeu R$ 4.000. Outro sargento da tropa de elite da corporacฬงaฬo ganhou R$ 2.000 e um cabo ficou com R$ 6.000. A Transwolff tambeฬm pagou R$ 3.725 para um policial militar e mais R$ 275 para outro PM. Sargento da Rota foi alertado por superiores sobre o perigo de trabalhar para a companhia. O alerta aconteceu em setembro de 2020, dias apoฬs a Operacฬงaฬo Sharks mirar em 20 integrantes do PCC acusados por lavagem de dinheiro. A adverteฬncia foi feita porque um dos acusados na Operacฬงaฬo Sharks era Gilberto Flares Lopes Pontes, o Tobeฬ, irmaฬo de Robson Flares Lopes Pontes, um dos diretores da Transwolff. Tobeฬ e os outros 19 comparsas denunciados na Operacฬงaฬo Sharks foram acusados pelo MP-SP de movimentar R$ 1 bilhaฬo do PCC, provenientes do traฬfico de drogas. A movimentacฬงaฬo teria acontecido no periฬodo de janeiro de 2018 a julho de 2019. Tobeฬ foi morto pelo tribunal do crime da faccฬงaฬo em agosto de 2021. Contrato da empresa com prefeitura foi rompido Empresa estaฬ sob intervencฬงaฬo desde 9 de abril de 2024, quando investigacฬงoฬes sobre suposto elo com o PCC...

title: Offizielle Mitteilung - Erstes Vonn-Training bei Olympia abgesagt!
content: TTS-Player uฬberspringen โต Artikel weiterlesen Die erste Olympia-Absage ! Das Abfahrtstraining der Frauen ist wegen heftigen Schneefalls abgesagt worden. Der dichte Neuschnee und die schlechte Sicht machen einen Start am Donnerstagvormittag unmoฬglich. Damit ist auch die erste Trainingsprobe von Lindsey Vonn nach ihrem Kreuzbandriss geplatzt. FIS-Renndirektor Peter Gerdol erklaฬrt: โEs gab bereits viel Niederschlag und wir erwarten noch mehr. Darum gilt unsere volle Konzentration dem Training vom Freitag.โ Bis Donnerstagnachmittag werden im Dolomiten-Ort Cortina dโAmpezzo noch rund 25 Zentimeter Neuschnee erwartet. Auf der Olympia-Strecke โOlimpia delle Tofaneโ koฬnnten es sogar bis zu 40 Zentimeter werden. Wie im Wohnheim! : In DIESEN Buden hausen unsere Olympia-Stars 05:23 Quelle: BILD 04.02.2026 Vonn wollte nach Kreuzbandriss ihr Knie testen Besonders bitter ist die Absage fuฬr Lindsey Vonn : Die US-Starfahrerin haฬtte das Training nach ihrem Kreuzbandriss dringend gebraucht, um nach ihrem Sturz zuletzt weitere Erkenntnisse uฬber ihren Zustand zu gewinnen. Trotz aller Sorgen plant die Fuฬhrende im Abfahrts-Weltcup einen Start in Cortina. Vor ihrer Verletzung galt sie als Top-Favoritin auf Olympiagold. Die Medaillen in der Frauen-Abfahrt werden am Sonntag vergeben. Mehr zum Thema US-Star verkuฬndet Olympia-Entscheidung : Vonn will mit Kreuzbandriss fahren! Lindsey Vonn will trotz Kreuzbandriss bei Olympia antreten, um ihr Land stolz zu machen. Eine Besonderheit gab es bei Olympia noch nie! : Deutsche Fahnentraฬger-Entscheidung gefallen! SIE sind unsere Fahnentraฬger bei Olympia! Optimismus kommt von Trainer Chris Knight. Gegenuฬber der Nachrichtenagentur AP sagte er: โIch habe keine Zweifel, dass alles in Ordnung sein wird.โ Das Knie zeige keine Schwellungen nach dem Training, zudem verspuฬre Vonn keine Schmerzen.

ะะธะฝะพะฒะฐ, ะฟัะธะฟะพะผะฝะธ ะณะพัััั ะฒ ัััะดะธะพัะพ. ะัะตะทะธะดะตะฝั, ะดะพะฒะตะดะตะฝ ะทะฐ ัััะธัะบะฐ ะพั ัะพัะธะฐะปะธััะธัะตัะบะฐัะฐ ะฟะฐััะธั ะธ ะดะตัะฝะธั ะัะฑะฐะฝ title: Mundial 2026 denuncia veto a peloteros latinos
content: Noticias al Diฬa y a la Hora | Uฬltimas Noticias del diฬa de hoyLa Confederacioฬn Panamericana de Beฬisbol, presidida por Aracelis Leoฬn, emitioฬ un comunicado oficial en el que denuncia la exclusioฬn injustificada de jugadores de paiฬses como Venezuela, Repuฬblica Dominicana y Puerto Rico en el marco del Claฬsico Mundial de Beฬisbol 2026. La organizacioฬn expresoฬ su solidaridad con las selecciones afectadas y advirtioฬ que estas decisiones atentan contra la equidad deportiva y el derecho de los fanaฬticos a ver a sus mejores representantes en el terreno.El comunicado, difundido por la cuenta oficial de WBSC Americas Beฬisbol en Instagram, exhorta a la Asociacioฬn de Peloteros de Grandes Ligas (MLBPA) a intervenir ante las aseguradoras de equipos MLB, responsables de aprobar o negar la participacioฬn de los jugadores. La Confederacioฬn exige criterios claros, justos y equitativos para todas las selecciones, senฬalando que el espectaฬculo pierde sentido si se impide que los atletas defiendan la camiseta de sus paiฬses.La denuncia pone en evidencia una tensioฬn estructural entre los intereses comerciales de la MLB y el espiฬritu deportivo del torneo. La Confederacioฬn Panamericana advierte que el beฬisbol es el deporte de Ameฬrica, y que impedir la participacioฬn de sus figuras maฬs emblemaฬticas representa una forma de censura que desvirtuฬa el evento y traiciona la pasioฬn de millones de seguidores. La criฬtica apunta directamente a las dinaฬmicas de poder que subordinan el juego a intereses corporativos.Con un llamado firme โ ยซpor amor al juegoยปโ, Aracelis Leoฬn exige que se respete la esencia del Claฬsico Mundial: la competencia justa entre naciones que comparten una historia beisbolera profunda. La exclusioฬn de peloteros latinoamericanos no solo afecta el rendimiento deportivo, sino que perpetuฬa una loฬgica de desigualdad que contradice el caraฬcter integrador del torneo. La Confederacioฬn Panamericana se planta: el beฬisbol no puede ser reheฬn de intereses privados.La noticia Mundial 2026 denuncia veto a peloteros latinos se publicoฬ primero en Noticias al Diฬa y a la Hora | Uฬltimas Noticias del diฬa de hoy

title: Mission accomplished: Hill-Lewis and Macpherson pay tribute to outgoing DA leader
content: Two of Democratic Alliance (DA) leader John Steenhuisenโs closest allies have paid tribute to his leadership after he announced on Wednesday that he wonโt be seeking a third term as party leader. Cape Town Mayor Geordin Hill-Lewis has described Steenhuisen as one of the most consequential leaders in the partyโs history. Meanwhile, Public Works Minister and Steenhuisenโs long-running campaign manager, Dean Macpherson, has expressed similar sentimentโsaying heโs achieved what he set out to do when he was first elected leader in 2019. Calling it quits on leading the DA when his term ends in April, Steenhuisen named both Hill-Lewis and Macpherson in his "Mission Accomplished" speech he made today as among those he mentored and nurtured to rise to higher office. Hill-Lewis, who has long been considered Steenhuisenโs most likely successor, has acknowledged him for taking over at a difficult time for the party and for having steadied the ship. He says Steenhuisen deserves honour and recognition for what heโs achieved by re-focusing the party and returning it to growth in the 2024 elections. โJohn leaves the Democratic Alliance in a better state than when he took the helm in 2019. It is now up to all of us โ every DA member โ to build on these foundations and take the party to greater heights,โ Hill-Lewis wrote in an X post. Meanwhile, the partyโs KwaZulu-Natal leader and Steenhuisenโs long-time confidante, Dean Macpherson, says Steenhuisen has played an important role in the partyโs trajectory in the province where he first entered politics as a city councillor. Macpherson has described him as dedicated, loyal, and hardworking, as well as having been a constant source of wisdom to the partyโs provincial structures.
creator: lindsay dentlinger

title: US seeks to prevent further Iranian harrasment of ships in Gulf - analysis
content: On Tuesday, the oil tanker M/V Stena Imperative was approached by Iranian small gunboats, according to reports. A US-flagged ship, it was apparently being harassed by the Iranians due to US-Iran tensions.In the past, during tense periods, the Iranians have placed anti-ship mines and also carried out raids to hijack them. Now it appears that the US Navy and US vessels have learned their lesson.A US tanker was able to prevent itself from being hijacked by Iranian fast boats, and a US warplane shot down an Iranian drone that was apparently shadowing the aircraft carrier USS Abraham Lincoln.Hostile actionsAccording to CBS, โBritish maritime security firm Vanguard Tech said on Tuesday that a US-flagged tanker was approached by Iranian gunboats, which threatened to board the vessel, in the Strait of Hormuz, before continuing on its way under military escort. The incident comes amid a tense standoff between the US and Iran, and days ahead of expected negotiations.โApparently, up to six small vessels of the Iranian Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps approached the 183-meter Stena Imperative around 16 nautical miles off the coast of Oman. โThe gunboats hailed the tanker by radio, ordering the captain 'to stop the engines and prepare to be boarded,' but the ship increased speed and maintained course, the firm added, stressing that it never entered Iranian territorial waters,โ the report said.Later, the vessel was aided by a US warship, which escorted it. According to marine tracking sites, the ship was now making 11 knots and was off the coast of Bahrain.The fact that the vessel outran the small Iranian boats appears to indicate that ships are learning the lessons of history. While the small Iranian craft operated by the IRGC may be faster than a far larger tanker, they have difficulty actually stopping such a big ship. They could open fire on the bridge of the ship, but firing on a US-flagged vessel would be a severe incident that could lead to war.History of harassmentThe Iranians prefer harassing tactics and hoping that ships will not call their bluff. In the second incident, a US F-35C shot down an Iranian Shahed 139. The drone was apparently operating near the USS Abraham Lincoln and its accompanying warships. Shooting down Iranian drones is a way to keep the Iranians' prying eyes from seeing US ships and also from harassing them.This is not the first time there have been drone wars over the Gulf. The Iranians downed an expensive US Global Hawk surveillance...

title: Grobari se tukli s poljskim huliganima koji su bili na Marakani: Porazฬeni su u dogovorenoj ulicฬnoj tucฬi
content: Navijacฬi Partizana mali su dogovorenu tucฬu sa pristalicama francuskog Liona i poljskog LKS Loฤa prema informacijama koje su objavile stranice specizalizovane za navijacฬka desฬavanja u Evropi. Kako javljaju sa portala "hooligans.cz", dogovorena je ulicฬna tucฬa izmeฤu navijacฬa Liona i LKS Loฤa protiv Grobara iz Pariza i grupe "Nueva Fuerza" koja je takoฤe deo Grobara. Tokom tucฬe 20 na 2, koja je trajala oko dva minuta, kao pobednici su izasฬli Francuzi i Poljaci. - Fer i jaka tucฬa. Veliko posฬtovanje za obe strane - stoji u opisu uz fotografiju ucฬesnika tucฬe. Inacฬe navijacฬi Olimpika iz Liona su u bratskim odnosima sa pristalicama LKS Loฤa iz Poljske. Oni su pre nekoliko meseci bili i u Beogradu, gde su podrzฬali svoj bratski klub Leh iz Poznanja tokom gostovanja Zvezdi u kvalifikacijama za Ligu sฬampiona. Tu su se istakli "u kavezu" Marakane sa tetovazฬama i uniformisanim majicama, a takoฤe su istakli i svoju zastavu u "kopu". Oni su sa Lehovim huliganima i bracฬom i Arke i Krakovije tokom dana pravili haos na ulicama Beograda, gde su se sฬetali goli uz skandiranje, ali su u povratku iz Beograda imali problem, jer su im Delije napravile sacฬekusฬu s motkama i polupali su nekoliko automobila, a takoฤe su i povredili nekoliko Poljaka tom prilikom . (Telegraf.rs)

title: Nicky Larson enfin disponible en version HD non censureฬe : voici comment regarder
content: On dit que Nicky Larson ne craint personne... Sauf la censure. Aฬ son arriveฬe sur les ondes francฬงaises au deฬbut des anneฬes 90, lโanime City Hunter adapteฬ du manga eฬponyme de Tsukasa Hoฬjoฬ arrive en France avec un titre diffeฬrent mais aussi tout un tas de changements. En effet, pour la seฬrie puisse eฬtre diffuseฬe dans lโeฬmission Club Dorotheฬe destineฬe aฬ un jeune public, il a bien fallu calmer les ardeurs du personnage principal dans lโHexagone. Mais maintenant que les spectateurs de lโeฬpoque sont largement en aฬge de deฬcouvrir la seฬrie dans sa forme originale, celle-ci est malheureusement introuvable... Ou du moins plus pour longtemps ! La chaiฬne de teฬleฬvision MANGAS (notamment disponible sur CANAL+, Prime Video et les diffeฬrentes box des fournisseurs dโacceฬs internet) vient dโannoncer lโarriveฬe dโune version full HD et non censureฬe de Nicky Larson aฬ compter du 23 feฬvrier. Les eฬpisodes seront diffuseฬs sur la chaiฬne du lundi au vendredi aฬ 19h40 et seront ensuite disponibles en replay. Cette sortie soudaine est loin dโeฬtre anodine puisquโelle accompagne le lancement dโune version remasteฬriseฬe et entieฬrement traduite en francฬงais du jeu City Hunter sorti sur PC Engine il y a 35 ans de cela. Le titre sera disponible sur PC, Xbox, PlayStation et Switch le 26 feฬvrier prochain. Nicky Larson cฬงa parle de quoi ? Pour les jeunes lecteurs qui nโont pas eu la chance de deฬcouvrir lโanime lors de sa diffusion originale de 1990 aฬ 1995, ou lors des nombreuses rediffusions sur NT1 ou Game One, voici le synopsis de la seฬrie que partage la chaiฬne MANGAS : Ouฬ regarder les live-action des ลuvres de Tsukasa Hoฬjoฬ ? Puisque les Francฬงais sont particulieฬrement friands des mangas de Tsukasa Hoฬjoฬ, quelques adaptations live-action surprenantes ont vu le jour ces dernieฬres anneฬes. Le long-meฬtrage Nicky Larson et le Parfum de Cupidon de Philippe Lacheau sorti en salles en 2019 nโest malheureusement pas disponible en streaming, mais peut eฬtre acheteฬ ou loueฬ en digital sur de nombreuses plateformes telles que Apple TV, Prime Video ou encore Canal+. Pour ce qui est de la seฬrie teฬleฬ Catโs Eyes , celle-ci est disponible directement depuis la plateforme TF1+. Pour rappel une seconde saison est actuellement en production et pourrait bien sortir deฬs cette anneฬe. Affaire aฬ suivre.
creator: arthur nicolle

title: 49ersโ Fred Warner, Kyle Shanahan to feature on NBCโs Super Bowl pregame show
content: The 49ers wonโt be playing in Super Bowl 60 on Sunday at Leviโs Stadium, but theyโll be represented in TV coverage of the game.Coach Kyle Shanahan and linebacker Fred Warner will appear on NBCโs pregame show, the network announced Wednesday.Theyโll be joined on the pregame show, which begins at 10 a.m., five and a half hours before kickoff, by former rival defensive tackle, Aaron Donald, who retired in 2024 from the Los Angeles Rams, and Pittsburgh Steelers defensive tackle Cam Heyward.The show will be anchored by Maria Taylor and include NBC football mainstays Tony Dungy, Jason Garrett, Rodney Harrison and Devin McCourty as well as Chris Simms, a former college teammate of Shanahanโs. Multiple segments of the show will air from Alcatraz Island, NBC announced this week.Warner appeared on television as a football analyst before, joining ESPNโs coverage of the playoffs last season when the 49ers failed to qualify for the postseason.The All-Pro captain of the 49ers defense suffered a gruesome ankle injury in an October loss at Tampa Bay and was nearing a return to the field when the 49ers were eliminated by the Seattle Seahawks in a divisional round blowout last month.Those Seahawks will face the New England Patriots, Harrisonโs former team, in Super Bowl 60 at the 49ersโ home stadium on Sunday afternoon.
creator: michael nowels

title: Auto eindigt in sloot bij eenzijdig ongeval in Barneveld
content: Een automobilist is woensdagmiddag met zijn auto in de sloot terecht gekomen aan de Thorbeckelaan in Barneveld. Het eenzijdige ongeval gebeurde rond 15:45 uur op de rotonde met de Nijkerkerweg. Door nog onbekende oorzaak reed de man met zijn auto over een verkeersheuvel om vervolgens via het fietspad in een sloot tot stilstand te komen. Omstanders hebben eerste hulp verleend. Met een ladder van de politie is de man uit de wagen gehaald. Hij is onderzocht door ambulancemedewerkers en voor verder onderzoek overgebracht naar het ziekenhuis. Een bergingsbedrijf heeft de zwaar beschadigde auto uit de sloot getrokken en afgevoerd.
creator: barneveldse krant

title: Quasi nessuno ne parla piuฬ, ma questo western uscito 9 anni fa eฬ un piccolo capolavoro
content: Nel vastissimo catalogo di Netflix, alcune serie finiscono per perdersi nel rumore di fondo, oscurate da titoli piuฬ longevi o piuฬ fortunati dal punto di vista mediatico. Eฬ il caso di Godless , miniserie western uscita nel 2017 che, a distanza di nove anni, appare oggi come una delle opere piuฬ mature, coraggiose e sottovalutate mai prodotte dalla piattaforma. Creata da Scott Frank, Godless arriva in un momento storico poco favorevole al genere. Il western televisivo non aveva ancora conosciuto la rinascita che sarebbe esplosa solo un anno dopo con Yellowstone, e il pubblico sembrava poco disposto a tornare verso un immaginario considerato superato. Eppure, giaฬ allora, Godless aveva tutte le carte in regola per distinguersi: una scrittura solida, una messa in scena rigorosa e unโidea narrativa capace di ribaltare i codici piuฬ consolidati del genere. Ambientata nel New Mexico del 1884, la serie segue Roy Goode, un fuorilegge ferito interpretato da Jack OโConnell, in fuga dal suo ex mentore Frank Griffin, un predicatore-armigerato spietato e carismatico incarnato da Jeff Daniels. La caccia allโuomo conduce Roy a La Belle, una cittadina mineraria apparentemente isolata, segnata da una tragedia che ne ha cambiato per sempre lโequilibrio sociale. Un disastro in miniera ha infatti ucciso quasi tutti gli uomini del paese, lasciando le donne a gestire la comunitaฬ, il lavoro e la sopravvivenza quotidiana. Questo dettaglio, tuttโaltro che marginale, diventa il cuore tematico di Godless. La serie usa il western non per raccontare lโepopea maschile della frontiera, ma per osservare cosa accade quando quel mito crolla e lascia spazio a nuove forme di potere, responsabilitaฬ e resistenza. Eฬ qui che Godless si rivela davvero diversa. Il genere non viene negato, ma riletto: la violenza eฬ presente, cosiฬ come il senso di fatalismo e di fine di unโepoca, ma il punto di vista eฬ spostato. Personaggi come Alice Fletcher, interpretata da Michelle Dockery, o la sceriffa improvvisata incarnata da Merritt Wever, danno vita a un racconto in cui il western diventa anche riflessione sulla perdita, sul trauma e sulla ricostruzione di unโidentitaฬ collettiva. A colpire, ancora oggi, eฬ il tono della serie. Godless eฬ cupa, sporca, spesso spietata, ma mai cinica. Accanto alla brutalitaฬ, trova spazio unโumanitaฬ fragile e credibile, fatta di silenzi, sguardi e scelte difficili. Anche i personaggi maschili, a partire dallo stesso Roy, sono lontani dallโeroe classico: feriti,...

title: ยฟQueฬ pasa si hay que evacuar el Estadio de la Cartuja? El Betis se prepara ante una emergencia grave
content: El Real Betis Balompiรฉ llevรณ a cabo el pasado domingo 1 de febrero el primer simulacro de evacuaciรณn en el Estadio La Cartuja, en el marco de su compromiso con la seguridad, la prevenciรณn y la correcta aplicaciรณn del Plan de Autoprotecciรณn en grandes eventos deportivos, un plan elaborado por el propio Club, segรบn informรณ en una nota. La informaciรณn se ha difundido en plena borrasca Leonardo, con varios puntos de Andalucรญa en alerta roja y avisos amarillos en la ciudad de Sevilla. El Real Betis Balompiรฉ de Manuel Pellegrini recibirรก al Atlรฉtico de Madrid de Diego Pablo Simeone en los cuartos de final de la Copa del Rey este jueves 5 de febrero a partir de las 21:00 horas en La Cartuja. Un partido que sigue adelante y confirmado, a la espera de ver la evoluciรณn del tiempo. La actividad, de unas dos horas de duraciรณn y realizada antes del partido que enfrentรณ al Real Betis y al Valencia CF, simulรณ una emergencia parcial en Fase Azul, Nivel 3, correspondiente a una situaciรณn con daรฑos graves potenciales sobre personas o bienes. Durante el simulacro se contemplaron distintos riesgos, como una intrusiรณn de un dron con paquete sospechoso, una avalancha de pรบblico y un conato de incendio. La Unidad de Control Organizativo (UCO), ubicada en una de las oficinas de La Cartuja con vistas al propio terreno de juego, fue la encargada de coordinar toda la actuaciรณn, en colaboraciรณn con la Unidad de Control Interno (UCI), compuesta por el personal de La Cartuja que gestiona toda la parcela tรฉcnica. Este espacio concentrรณ al personal responsable de la seguridad del evento y sirviรณ como centro de toma de decisiones y coordinaciรณn de los distintos intervinientes. El escenario simulado partiรณ con la detecciรณn de un dron con carga explosiva, interceptado por el sistema antidrones del Cuerpo Nacional de Policรญa y precipitado al terreno de juego. Esta situaciรณn generรณ una alarma general, una avalancha de pรบblico y un conato de incendio en la cantina de la grada baja de Gol Sur. Como consecuencia, se ejecutรณ una evacuaciรณn sectorizada de dicha zona, con mรบltiples vรญctimas simuladas que requirieron atenciรณn sanitaria. El principal objetivo del simulacro fue evaluar de forma integral la capacidad de respuesta del Estadio La Cartuja y del Real Betis Balompiรฉ ante una emergencia compleja, comprobando la correcta activaciรณn del Plan de Autoprotecciรณn, la eficacia de los procedimientos operativos y la coordinaciรณn entre los distintos servicios implicados.  De...

title: UTA - CFR 0-1. Clujenii au obtฬฆinut a sฬฆasea victorie la raฬnd sฬฆi s-au apropiat la un punct de play-off
content: UTA - CFR 0-1. Clujenii au obtฬฆinut a sฬฆasea victorie la raฬnd sฬฆi s-au apropiat la un punct de play-off 04.02.2026, 19:56 SuperLiga: FCSB - FC Botosฬฆani , joi, 20:30, DGS 1 SuperLiga: Universitatea Craiova - Otฬฆelul , joi, 18:00, DGS 1 CFR Cluj a iฬnvins-o iฬn deplasare, scor 1-0, pe UTA Arad , iฬn etapa a 25-a din SuperLigaฬ. Unicul gol al partidei a fost marcat de Meriton Korenica iฬn minutul 68. Iฬn urma acestui succes, formatฬฆia lui Daniel Pancu a ajuns la sฬฆase victorii consecutive iฬn campionat sฬฆi s-a apropiat la un singur punct de zona play-off-ului. UTA - CFR 0-1 UTA a iฬnceput mai curajoasaฬ acest meci sฬฆi a marcat iฬncaฬ din minutul 3, dar reusฬฆita lui Coman a fost anulataฬ pentru ofsaid. Tot araฬdenii au presat sฬฆi au fost aproape de deschiderea scorului iฬn minutul 27, caฬnd Braun a deviat periculos mingea spre propria poartaฬ. CFR a replicat imediat, iฬn minutul 28, prin Korenica, cel care a sฬฆutat din caฬtฬฆiva metri iฬn blocajul lui Gorcea. CFR a dat lovitura sฬฆi a marcat iฬn minutul 68 prin Meriton Korenica, la capaฬtul unei faze iฬncepute de Tidiane Keita sฬฆi continuate excelent de Alibek, cel care a oferit un assist cu caฬlcaฬiul. CFR iฬsฬฆi putea dubla avantajul iฬn minutul 81 prin Sinyan, dar executฬฆia sa sub transversalaฬ a fost blocataฬ in extremis de Gorcea. Iฬn cele din urmaฬ, CFR s-a impus iฬn acest joc, scor 1-0. Clasament SuperLigaฬ Clasament SuperLigaฬ / Foto: Digi Sport VIDEO Rezumat UTA Arad - CFR Cluj, scor 0-1
